trans-unit.source: (F) With "strict subs" in use, a bareword is only allowed as a subroutine identifier, in curly brackets or to the left of the "=>" symbol. Perhaps you need to predeclare a subroutine?
trans-unit.target: （F）使用“ strict subs”时，仅允许在大括号中或在“ =>”符号左侧将裸字用作子例程标识符。也许您需要预先声明一个子例程？

trans-unit.source: (F) Within (?[ ]) , all constants interpreted as octal need to be exactly 3 digits long. This helps catch some ambiguities. If your constant is too short, add leading zeros, like
trans-unit.target: （F）在 (?[ ]) ，所有解释为八进制的常量都必须正好是3位数字。这有助于捕捉一些歧义。如果您的常数太短，请添加前导零，例如

trans-unit.source: (F) Within (?[ ]), all constants interpreted as octal need to be exactly 3 digits long. This helps catch some ambiguities. If your constant is too short, add leading zeros, like
trans-unit.target: （F）在 (?[ ]) ，所有解释为八进制的常量都必须正好是3位数字。这有助于捕捉一些歧义。如果您的常数太短，请添加前导零，例如

trans-unit.source: (F) Within regular expression character classes ([]) the syntax beginning with "[." and ending with ".]" is reserved for future extensions. If you need to represent those character sequences inside a regular expression character class, just quote the square brackets with the backslash: "\[." and ".\]". The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered. See perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）在正则表达式字符类（[]）中，语法以“ [。”开头。并以“。]”结尾保留用于将来的扩展。如果需要在正则表达式字符类中表示这些字符序列，只需在方括号中加上反斜杠：“ \ [。” 和“。\]”。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) Within regular expression character classes ([]) the syntax beginning with "[=" and ending with "=]" is reserved for future extensions. If you need to represent those character sequences inside a regular expression character class, just quote the square brackets with the backslash: "\[=" and "=\]". The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered. See perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）在正则表达式字符类（[]）中，以“ [=”开始并以“ =]结束”的语法保留给以后的扩展。如果您需要在正则表达式字符类中表示这些字符序列，只需在方括号中加上反斜杠：“ \ [=”和“ = \]”。 <-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) Wrong syntax of character name literal \N{charname} within double-quotish context. This can also happen when there is a space (or comment) between the \N and the { in a regex with the /x modifier. This modifier does not change the requirement that the brace immediately follow the \N .
trans-unit.target: （F）在双引号上下文中字符名称文字 \N{charname} 语法错误。当 \N 和 { 之间的空格（或注释）在带有 /x 修饰符的正则表达式中时，也会发生这种情况。此修饰符不会更改括号紧跟 \N 。

trans-unit.source: (F) Wrong syntax of character name literal \N{charname} within double-quotish context. This can also happen when there is a space (or comment) between the \N and the { in a regex with the /x modifier. This modifier does not change the requirement that the brace immediately follow the \N.
trans-unit.target: （F）在双引号上下文中字符名称文字 \N{charname} 语法错误。当 \N 与 { 之间的空格（或注释）在带有 /x 修饰符的正则表达式中时，也会发生这种情况。此修饰符不会更改括号紧跟 \N 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You are now required to use the explicitly quoted form if you wish to use an empty line as the terminator of the here-document.
trans-unit.target: （F）现在，如果您希望使用空行作为此处文档的终止符，则必须使用显式引用的格式。

trans-unit.source: (F) You aren't allowed to assign to the item indicated, or otherwise try to change it, such as with an auto-increment.
trans-unit.target: （F）不允许您分配给指定的项目，或尝试进行其他更改，例如使用自动增量。

trans-unit.source: (F) You assigned a magical array to a stash element, and then tried to use the subroutine from the same slot. You are asking Perl to do something it cannot do, details subject to change between Perl versions.
trans-unit.target: （F）您为存储元素分配了一个魔术数组，然后尝试使用同一插槽中的子例程。您要Perl做一些它不能做的事情，细节可能会因Perl版本而异。

trans-unit.source: (F) You assigned a reference to a scalar to $/ where the referenced item is not a positive integer. In older perls this appeared to work the same as setting it to undef but was in fact internally different, less efficient and with very bad luck could have resulted in your file being split by a stringified form of the reference.
trans-unit.target: （F）您将对标量的引用分配给 $/ ，其中引用的项目不是正整数。在较早的Perls中，此功能似乎与将其设置为 undef 相同，但实际上在内部有所不同，效率较低且运气不佳，可能会导致您的文件被字符串化的引用形式拆分。

trans-unit.source: (F) You attempted to force a different byte-order on a type that is already inside a group with a byte-order modifier. For example you cannot force little-endianness on a type that is inside a big-endian group.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用字节顺序修饰符对已经在组内的类型强制使用不同的字节顺序。例如，您不能在big-endian组内的类型上强制使用little-endianness。

trans-unit.source: (F) You attempted to unweaken something that was not a reference. Only references can be unweakened.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图弱化不是参考的内容。只有参考可以被削弱。

trans-unit.source: (F) You attempted to use a feature of printf that is accessible from only C. This usually means there's a better way to do it in Perl.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用仅可通过C访问的printf功能。这通常意味着在Perl中有更好的方法。

trans-unit.source: (F) You attempted to weaken something that was not a reference. Only references can be weakened.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图弱化不是参考的东西。只有参考可以被削弱。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called continue, but you're not inside a when or default block.
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 continue ，但您不在 when 或 default 块内。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called keys, values or each with a scalar argument that was not a reference to an unblessed hash or array.
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 keys ， values 或 each 一个都带有标量参数，该标量参数不是对非哈希或数组的引用。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called reset('E') or similar, which tried to reset all variables in the current package beginning with "E". In the main package, that includes %ENV. Resetting %ENV is not supported on some systems, notably VMS.
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 reset('E') 或类似的名称，它试图重置以“ E”开头的当前包中的所有变量。在主程序包中，其中包括％ENV。在某些系统上（特别是VMS）不支持重置％ENV。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called break , but you're in a foreach block rather than a given block. You probably meant to use next or last.
trans-unit.target: （F）您打电话给 break ，但是您在一个 foreach 块中，而不是在 given 块中。您可能打算使用 next 或 last 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called break , but you're not inside a given block.
trans-unit.target: （F）您打电话给 break ，但您不在 given 区块内。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called break, but you're in a foreach block rather than a given block. You probably meant to use next or last.
trans-unit.target: （F）您打电话给 break ，但是您在一个 foreach 块中，而不是在 given 块中。您可能打算使用 next 或 last 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called break, but you're not inside a given block.
trans-unit.target: （F）您打电话给 break ，但您不在 given 区块内。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called continue, but you're not inside a when or default block.
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 continue ，但您不在 when 或 default 块内。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called perl -x/foo/bar, but
trans-unit.target: [F）您调用了 perl -x/foo/bar ，但是

trans-unit.source: (F) You called perl -x , but no line was found in the file beginning with #! and containing the word "perl".
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 perl -x ，但是在以＃开头的文件中未找到任何行！并包含“ perl”一词。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called perl -x, but no line was found in the file beginning with #! and containing the word "perl".
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 perl -x ，但是在以＃开头的文件中未找到任何行！并包含“ perl”一词。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called reset('E') or similar, which tried to reset all variables in the current package beginning with "E". In the main package, that includes %ENV. Resetting %ENV is not supported on some systems, notably VMS.
trans-unit.target: （F）您调用了 reset('E') 或类似的名称，它试图重置以“ E”开头的当前程序包中的所有变量。在主程序包中，其中包括％ENV。在某些系统上（特别是VMS）不支持重置％ENV。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a POSIX function with incorrect arguments. See "FUNCTIONS" in POSIX for more information.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用错误的参数调用了POSIX函数。有关更多信息，请参见POSIX中的“功能”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a POSIX function with incorrect arguments. See FUNCTIONS in POSIX for more information.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用错误的参数调用了POSIX函数。有关更多信息，请参见POSIX中的FUNCTIONS。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a Win32 function with incorrect arguments. See Win32 for more information.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用错误的参数调用了Win32函数。有关更多信息，请参见Win32。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a Win32 function with incorrect arguments. See Win32 for more information.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用错误的参数调用了Win32函数。有关更多信息，请参见Win32。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a method correctly, and it correctly indicated a package functioning as a class, but that package doesn't define that particular method, nor does any of its base classes. See perlobj.
trans-unit.target: （F）您正确地调用了一个方法，并且正确地指示了一个程序包充当类，但是该程序包未定义该特定方法，也未定义任何基类。参见perlobj。

trans-unit.source: (F) You called a method on a class that did not exist, and the method could not be found in UNIVERSAL. This often means that a method requires a package that has not been loaded.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在一个不存在的类上调用了一个方法，而该方法在UNIVERSAL中找不到。这通常意味着方法需要尚未加载的程序包。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't allocate more than 2^31+"small amount" bytes. This error is most likely to be caused by a typo in the Perl program. e.g., $arr[time] instead of $arr[$time] .
trans-unit.target: （F）您分配的字节数不能超过2 ^ 31 +个“少量”。此错误最有可能是由Perl程序中的错字引起的。例如， $arr[time] 而不是 $arr[$time] 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't allocate more than 2^31+"small amount" bytes. This error is most likely to be caused by a typo in the Perl program. e.g., $arr[time] instead of $arr[$time].
trans-unit.target: （F）您分配的字节数不能超过2 ^ 31 +个“少量”。此错误最有可能是由Perl程序中的错字引起的。例如， $arr[time] 而不是 $arr[$time] 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't allocate more than 64K on an MS-DOS machine.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能在MS-DOS计算机上分配超过64K的内存。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't pack a string by supplying a checksum, because the checksumming process loses information, and you can't go the other way. See unpack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能通过提供校验和来打包字符串，因为校验和过程会丢失信息，并且您也无法采用其他方法。请参阅解压缩。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't pack a string by supplying a checksum, because the checksumming process loses information, and you can't go the other way. See "unpack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能通过提供校验和来打包字符串，因为校验和过程会丢失信息，并且您也无法采用其他方法。请参阅perlfunc中的“解压”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't quantify a quantifier without intervening parentheses. So things like ** or +* or ?* are illegal. The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered.
trans-unit.target: （F）您必须在没有括号的情况下对量词进行量化。因此，诸如**或+ *或？*之类的东西都是非法的。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't specify a repeat count so large that it overflows your signed integers. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能指定太大的重复计数以至于溢出您的带符号整数。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't specify a repeat count so large that it overflows your signed integers. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能指定太大的重复计数以至于溢出您的带符号整数。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't undefine a routine that's currently running. You can, however, redefine it while it's running, and you can even undef the redefined subroutine while the old routine is running. Go figure.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能取消定义当前正在运行的例程。但是，您可以在运行时重新定义它，甚至可以在旧例程运行时取消对重新定义的子例程的定义。去搞清楚。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't use system(), exec(), or a piped open in a setuid or setgid script if $ENV{PATH} contains a directory that is writable by the world. Also, the PATH must not contain any relative directory. See perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果 $ENV{PATH} 包含可被世界写入的目录，则不能在setuid或setgid脚本中使用system（），exec（）或管道打开。另外，PATH不得包含任何相对目录。参见perlsec。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't use system(), exec(), or a piped open in a setuid or setgid script if any of $ENV{PATH} , $ENV{IFS} , $ENV{CDPATH} , $ENV{ENV} , $ENV{BASH_ENV} or $ENV{TERM} are derived from data supplied (or potentially supplied) by the user. The script must set the path to a known value, using trustworthy data. See perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果 $ENV{PATH} ， $ENV{IFS} ， $ENV{CDPATH} ， $ENV{ENV} 任何一个，则不能在setuid或setgid脚本中使用system（），exec（）或管道打开ENV}， $ENV{BASH_ENV} 或 $ENV{TERM} 源自用户提供（或潜在提供）的数据。脚本必须使用可信赖的数据将路径设置为已知值。参见perlsec。

trans-unit.source: (F) You can't use system(), exec(), or a piped open in a setuid or setgid script if any of $ENV{PATH}, $ENV{IFS}, $ENV{CDPATH}, $ENV{ENV}, $ENV{BASH_ENV} or $ENV{TERM} are derived from data supplied (or potentially supplied) by the user. The script must set the path to a known value, using trustworthy data. See perlsec.
trans-unit.target: （F）如果 $ENV{PATH} ， $ENV{IFS} ， $ENV{CDPATH} ， $ENV{ENV} ， $ENV{BASH_ENV} 或 $ENV{TERM} 源自用户提供（或可能提供）的数据。脚本必须使用可信赖的数据将路径设置为已知值。参见perlsec。

trans-unit.source: (F) You cannot put a repeat count of any kind right after the '/' code. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能在'/'代码后加上任何形式的重复计数。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You cannot put a repeat count of any kind right after the '/' code. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您不能在'/'代码后加上任何形式的重复计数。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You defined a character name which ended in a space character. Remove the trailing space(s). Usually these names are defined in the :alias import argument to use charnames , but they could be defined by a translator installed into $^H{charnames} . See CUSTOM ALIASES in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您定义了以空格字符结尾的字符名称。删除尾随空格。通常，这些名称在 :alias import参数中定义以 use charnames ，但是可以由安装在 $^H{charnames} 的翻译器定义。请参阅字符名称中的自定义别名。

trans-unit.source: (F) You defined a character name which ended in a space character. Remove the trailing space(s). Usually these names are defined in the :alias import argument to use charnames, but they could be defined by a translator installed into $^H{charnames}. See "CUSTOM ALIASES" in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您定义了以空格字符结尾的字符名称。删除尾随空格。通常，这些名称在 :alias import参数中定义为 use charnames ，但可以由安装在 $^H{charnames} 的转换器定义。请参见字符名称中的“自定义别名”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You defined a character name which had multiple space characters in a row. Change them to single spaces. Usually these names are defined in the :alias import argument to use charnames , but they could be defined by a translator installed into $^H{charnames} . See CUSTOM ALIASES in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您定义了一个字符名称，该名称连续有多个空格字符。将它们更改为单个空格。通常，这些名称在 :alias import参数中定义以 use charnames ，但是可以由安装在 $^H{charnames} 的翻译器定义。请参阅字符名称中的自定义别名。

trans-unit.source: (F) You defined a character name which had multiple space characters in a row. Change them to single spaces. Usually these names are defined in the :alias import argument to use charnames, but they could be defined by a translator installed into $^H{charnames}. See "CUSTOM ALIASES" in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您定义了一个字符名称，该名称连续有多个空格字符。将它们更改为单个空格。通常，这些名称在 :alias import参数中定义为 use charnames ，但可以由安装在 $^H{charnames} 的转换器定义。请参见字符名称中的“自定义别名”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You don't have System V message IPC on your system.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的系统上没有System V消息IPC。

trans-unit.source: (F) You don't have System V semaphore IPC on your system.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的系统上没有System V信号量IPC。

trans-unit.source: (F) You don't have System V shared memory IPC on your system.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的系统上没有System V共享内存IPC。

trans-unit.source: (F) You either made a typo or have incorrectly put a * quantifier after an open brace in your pattern. Check the pattern and review perlre for details on legal verb patterns.
trans-unit.target: （F）您输入了错字或在花括号中的右括号后错误地放置了 * 量词。检查模式并查看perlre以获取有关法律动词模式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a (sub-)template that ends with a '/'. There must be another template code following the slash. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个以'/'结尾的（子）模板。斜杠后必须有另一个模板代码。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a (sub-)template that ends with a '/'. There must be another template code following the slash. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个以'/'结尾的（子）模板。斜杠后必须有另一个模板代码。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a (un)pack template that specified a relative position before the beginning of the string being (un)packed. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个（未打包）模板，该模板指定了要（未打包）字符串开头之前的相对位置。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a (un)pack template that specified a relative position before the beginning of the string being (un)packed. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个（未打包）模板，该模板指定了要（未打包）字符串开头之前的相对位置。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a pack template that specified a relative position after the end of the string being unpacked. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个打包模板，该模板指定了要解压缩的字符串结尾之后的相对位置。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a pack template that specified a relative position after the end of the string being unpacked. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个打包模板，该模板指定了要解压的字符串末尾之后的相对位置。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a template that specified an absolute position outside the string being unpacked. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个模板，该模板指定了要解压缩的字符串之外的绝对位置。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a template that specified an absolute position outside the string being unpacked. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个模板，该模板指定了要解压缩的字符串之外的绝对位置。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a template that specified an absolute position outside the string being unpacked. The string being unpacked was also invalid UTF-8. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个模板，该模板指定了要解压缩的字符串之外的绝对位置。解压缩的字符串也是无效的UTF-8。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had a template that specified an absolute position outside the string being unpacked. The string being unpacked was also invalid UTF-8. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个模板，该模板指定了要解压缩的字符串之外的绝对位置。解压缩的字符串也是无效的UTF-8。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had an unpack template indicating a counted-length string, but you have also specified an explicit size for the string. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个解包模板，该模板指示长度计的字符串，但是您还为该字符串指定了显式的大小。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had an unpack template indicating a counted-length string, but you have also specified an explicit size for the string. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个解包模板，该模板指示长度计的字符串，但您还为该字符串指定了显式的大小。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had an unpack template that contained a '/', but this did not follow some unpack specification producing a numeric value. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个包含'/'的解压缩模板，但是没有遵循某些解压缩规范生成数字值。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had an unpack template that contained a '/', but this did not follow some unpack specification producing a numeric value. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个包含'/'的解压缩模板，但是没有遵循某些解压缩规范生成数字值。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You had something like this:
trans-unit.target: （F）你有这样的事情：

trans-unit.source: (F) You have an indented here-document where one or more of its lines have whitespace at the beginning that does not match the closing delimiter.
trans-unit.target: （F）您有一个缩进此处的文档，其中一个或多个行的开头具有与结束定界符不匹配的空格。

trans-unit.source: (F) You have configured Perl to use long doubles but the internals of the long double format are unknown; therefore the hexadecimal float output is impossible.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经将Perl配置为使用长双精度，但是长双精度格式的内部是未知的；因此十六进制浮点输出是不可能的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You have exceeded the number of open "(" parentheses that haven't been matched by corresponding closing ones. This limit prevents eating up too much memory. It is initially set to 1000, but may be changed by setting ${^RE_COMPILE_RECURSION_LIMIT} to some other value. This may need to be done in a BEGIN block before the regular expression pattern is compiled.
trans-unit.target: （F）您超出了未与相应的右括号匹配的开括号 "(" ）的数量。此限制防止占用过多的内存。它最初设置为1000，但可以通过设置 ${^RE_COMPILE_RECURSION_LIMIT} 来更改RE_COMPILE_RECURSION_LIMIT}设置为其他值，这可能需要在BEGIN块中完成，然后再编译正则表达式模式。

trans-unit.source: (F) You have used a default block that is neither inside a foreach loop nor a given block. (Note that this error is issued on exit from the default block, so you won't get the error if you use an explicit continue.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用的 default 块既不在 foreach 循环内，也不在 given 块内。（请注意，此错误是在 default 块退出时发出的，因此，如果使用显式的 continue ，则不会收到该错误。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You have used a default block that is neither inside a foreach loop nor a given block. (Note that this error is issued on exit from the default block, so you won't get the error if you use an explicit continue.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用的 default 块既不在 foreach 循环内，也不在 given 块内。（请注意，此错误是在 default 块退出时发出的，因此，如果使用显式的 continue ，则不会收到该错误。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You have used a when() block that is neither inside a foreach loop nor a given block. (Note that this error is issued on exit from the when block, so you won't get the error if the match fails, or if you use an explicit continue.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用的when（）块既不在 foreach 循环内，也不在 given 块内。（请注意，此错误是在 when 块退出时发出的，因此，如果匹配失败或使用显式的 continue ，则不会收到该错误。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You have used a when() block that is neither inside a foreach loop nor a given block. (Note that this error is issued on exit from the when block, so you won't get the error if the match fails, or if you use an explicit continue.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用的when（）块既不在 foreach 循环内，也不在 given 块内。（请注意，此错误是在 when 块退出时发出的，因此，如果匹配失败或使用显式的 continue ，则不会收到该错误。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You manipulated Perl's symbol table directly, stored a reference in it, then tried to access that symbol via conventional Perl syntax. The access triggers Perl to autovivify that typeglob, but it there is no legal conversion from that type of reference to a typeglob.
trans-unit.target: （F）您直接操作了Perl的符号表，在其中存储了引用，然后尝试通过常规Perl语法访问该符号。该访问会触发Perl自动激活该typeglob，但是没有从该引用类型到typeglob的合法转换。

trans-unit.source: (F) You may have tried to use \p which means a Unicode property (for example \p{Lu} matches all uppercase letters). If you did mean to use a Unicode property, see Properties accessible through \p{} and \P{} in perluniprops for a complete list of available properties. If you didn't mean to use a Unicode property, escape the \p , either by \\p (just the \p ) or by \Q\p (the rest of the string, or until \E ).
trans-unit.target: （F）您可能尝试使用 \p 表示Unicode属性（例如 \p{Lu} 匹配所有大写字母）。如果确实要使用Unicode属性，请参阅perluniprops中可通过\ p {}和\ P {}访问的属性，以获取可用属性的完整列表。如果您不打算使用Unicode属性，请通过 \\p （只是 \p ）或 \Q\p （字符串的其余部分，或者直到 \E ）对 \p 转义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You must now decide whether the final $ in a string was meant to be a literal dollar sign, or was meant to introduce a variable name that happens to be missing. So you have to put either the backslash or the name.
trans-unit.target: （F）现在，您必须确定字符串中的最后$是要用作文字美元符号，还是要引入恰好丢失的变量名。因此，您必须输入反斜杠或名称。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to break out of, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See last.
trans-unit.target: （F）您命名了一个要中断的循环，但是即使您算上调用的来源，您当前也未处于该循环中。见最后。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to break out of, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See "last" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您命名了一个要中断的循环，但是即使您算上调用的来源，您目前也没有处于该名称的循环中。参见perlfunc中的“ last”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to continue, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See last.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已命名一个要继续的循环，但是即使您算上调用的来源，您当前也没有处于该名称的循环中。见最后。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to continue, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See "last" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已命名一个要继续的循环，但是即使您算上调用的来源，您当前也没有处于该名称的循环中。参见perlfunc中的“ last”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to restart, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See last.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已命名一个要重新启动的循环，但是即使您算上调用的来源，您当前也没有处于该名称的循环中。见最后。

trans-unit.source: (F) You named a loop to restart, but you're not currently in a loop of that name, not even if you count where you were called from. See "last" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已命名一个要重新启动的循环，但是即使您算上调用的位置，您当前也未处于该名称的循环中。参见perlfunc中的“ last”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You omitted to close a (?(condition)...) block somewhere in the pattern. Add a closing parenthesis in the appropriate position. See perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）您省略了关闭模式中某处的（？（condition）...）块。在适当的位置添加右括号。参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed a buffer of the wrong size to one of msgctl(), semctl() or shmctl(). In C parlance, the correct sizes are, respectively, sizeof(struct msqid_ds *), sizeof(struct semid_ds *), and sizeof(struct shmid_ds *).
trans-unit.target: （F）您将错误大小的缓冲区传递给了msgctl（），semctl（）或shmctl（）中的一个。用C的话来说，正确的大小分别是sizeof（struct msqid_ds *），sizeof（struct semid_ds *）和sizeof（struct shmid_ds *）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed a reference to a blessed array to push, shift or another array function. These only accept unblessed array references or arrays beginning explicitly with @ .
trans-unit.target: （F）您传递了对有福数组的引用，以进行 push ， shift 或其他数组功能。这些仅接受无祝福的数组引用或以 @ 开头的数组。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid ANSI escape sequence to uncolor().
trans-unit.target: （F）您将无效的ANSI转义序列传递给uncolor（）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid alias name to coloralias(). Alias names must consist only of alphanumerics, ., - , and _ .
trans-unit.target: （F）您将无效的别名传递给coloralias（）。别名必须仅包含字母数字 . ， - 和 _ 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid alias name to coloralias(). Alias names must consist only of alphanumerics, ., -, and _.
trans-unit.target: （F）您将无效的别名传递给coloralias（）。别名必须仅由字母数字组成 . ， - 和 _ 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid attribute name to color(), colored(), or coloralias().
trans-unit.target: （F）您将无效的属性名称传递给color（），colored（）或coloralias（）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid number (like an infinity or not-a-number) to chr.
trans-unit.target: （F）您向 chr 传递了无效数字（例如无穷大或非数字）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed an invalid number (like an infinity or not-a-number) to chr.
trans-unit.target: （F）您将无效数字（例如无穷大或非数字）传递给了 chr 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed die() an empty string (the equivalent of die "" ) or you called it with no args and $@ was empty.
trans-unit.target: （F）您向die（）传递了一个空字符串（等效于 die "" ），或者您不带参数地调用了该字符串，并且 $@ 为空。

trans-unit.source: (F) You passed die() an empty string (the equivalent of die "") or you called it with no args and $@ was empty.
trans-unit.target: （F）您向die（）传递了一个空字符串（等效于 die "" ），或者您不带参数地调用了该字符串，并且 $@ 为空。

trans-unit.source: (F) You probably mistyped a constant color name such as:
trans-unit.target: （F）您可能输错了恒定的颜色名称，例如：

trans-unit.source: (F) You provided a class qualifier in a "my", "our" or "state" declaration, but this class doesn't exist at this point in your program.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在“我的”，“我们的”或“州”声明中提供了类限定符，但该类在您的程序中目前不存在。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said use utf8 , but the program file doesn't comply with UTF-8 encoding rules. The message prints out the properly encoded characters just before the first bad one. If utf8 warnings are enabled, a warning is generated that gives more details about the type of malformation.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说 use utf8 ，但是程序文件不符合UTF-8编码规则。该消息将在第一个错误字符之前打印出正确编码的字符。如果启用了 utf8 警告，则会生成一条警告，其中提供有关格式错误类型的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like "use Module 42" but in the Module file there are neither package declarations nor a $VERSION .
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过类似“使用模块42”的内容，但是在模块文件中既没有包声明也没有 $VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like "use Module 42" but in the Module file there are neither package declarations nor a $VERSION.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过类似“使用模块42”的内容，但是在模块文件中既没有包声明也没有 $VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like "use Module 42" but the Module did not define a $VERSION .
trans-unit.target: （F）您说了类似“使用模块42”的内容，但该模块未定义 $VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like "use Module 42" but the Module did not define a $VERSION.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说了类似“使用模块42”的内容，但该模块未定义 $VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like local $$ref , which Perl can't currently handle, because when it goes to restore the old value of whatever $ref pointed to after the scope of the local() is finished, it can't be sure that $ref will still be a reference.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过类似Perl目前无法处理的 local $$ref 类的东西，因为当local（）的作用域完成后，当它恢复$ ref所指向的旧值时，它就无法执行确保$ ref仍然是引用。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said something like local $$ref, which Perl can't currently handle, because when it goes to restore the old value of whatever $ref pointed to after the scope of the local() is finished, it can't be sure that $ref will still be a reference.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过类似Perl目前无法处理的 local $$ref 类的东西，因为当local（）的作用域完成后，当它恢复$ ref所指向的旧值时，它就无法执行确保$ ref仍然是引用。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said to do (or require, or use) a file that couldn't be found. Perl looks for the file in all the locations mentioned in @INC, unless the file name included the full path to the file. Perhaps you need to set the PERL5LIB or PERL5OPT environment variable to say where the extra library is, or maybe the script needs to add the library name to @INC. Or maybe you just misspelled the name of the file. See require and lib.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说要 do （或 require 或 use ）找不到的文件。Perl在@INC中提到的所有位置查找文件，除非文件名包含文件的完整路径。也许您需要设置PERL5LIB或PERL5OPT环境变量来说明额外的库在哪里，或者脚本需要将库名称添加到@INC。或者，也许您只是拼错了文件名。参见require和lib。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said to do (or require, or use) a file that couldn't be found. Perl looks for the file in all the locations mentioned in @INC, unless the file name included the full path to the file. Perhaps you need to set the PERL5LIB or PERL5OPT environment variable to say where the extra library is, or maybe the script needs to add the library name to @INC. Or maybe you just misspelled the name of the file. See "require" in perlfunc and lib.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说要 do （或 require 或 use ）找不到的文件。Perl会在@INC中提到的所有位置查找文件，除非文件名包含文件的完整路径。也许您需要设置PERL5LIB或PERL5OPT环境变量来说明额外的库在哪里，或者脚本需要将库名称添加到@INC。或者，也许您只是拼错了文件名。请参见perlfunc和lib中的“ require”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said to goto a label that isn't mentioned anywhere that it's possible for us to go to. See goto.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过要去一个我们可能去的地方都没有提到的标签。参见goto。

trans-unit.source: (F) You said to goto a label that isn't mentioned anywhere that it's possible for us to go to. See "goto" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您说过要去一个标签，在我们有可能去的任何地方都没有提及。请参阅perlfunc中的“ goto”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You should not use the ~~ operator on an object that does not overload it: Perl refuses to use the object's underlying structure for the smart match.
trans-unit.target: （F）不应在不会重载对象的对象上使用 ~~ 运算符：Perl拒绝将对象的基础结构用于智能匹配。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a *roff font (using fixed , fixedbold , etc.) that wasn't either one or two characters. Pod::Man doesn't support *roff fonts longer than two characters, although some *roff extensions do (the canonical versions of nroff and troff don't either).
trans-unit.target: （F）您指定了一个* roff字体（使用 fixed ， fixedbold 等），它不是一个或两个字符。Pod :: Man不支持* roff字体长于两个字符，尽管某些* roff扩展名支持（不支持nroff和troff的规范版本）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a *roff font (using fixed, fixedbold, etc.) that wasn't either one or two characters. Pod::Man doesn't support *roff fonts longer than two characters, although some *roff extensions do (the canonical versions of nroff and troff don't either).
trans-unit.target: （F）您指定了一个* roff字体（使用 fixed ， fixedbold 等），它不是一个或两个字符。 Pod :: Man不支持* roff字体长于两个字符，尽管某些* roff扩展名也支持（nroff和troff的规范版本均不支持）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a Unicode-like property name in a regular expression pattern (using \p{} or \P{}) that Perl knows isn't an official Unicode property, and was likely meant to be a user-defined property name, but it can't be one of those, as they must begin with either In or Is. Check the spelling. See also "Can't find Unicode property definition "%s"".
trans-unit.target: （F）您以正则表达式模式（使用 \p{} 或 \P{} ）指定了类似Unicode的属性名称，Perl知道这不是正式的Unicode属性，并且很可能是用户定义的属性名称，但不能是其中之一，因为它们必须以 In 或 Is 开头。检查拼写。另请参见“找不到Unicode属性定义“％s””。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a signal hook that was not recognized by Perl. Currently, Perl accepts __DIE__ and __WARN__ as valid signal hooks.
trans-unit.target: （F）您指定了Perl无法识别的信号钩。当前，Perl接受 __DIE__ 和 __WARN__ 作为有效的信号挂钩。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a signal name to the kill() function that was not recognized. Say kill -l in your shell to see the valid signal names on your system.
trans-unit.target: （F）您为kill（）函数指定了无法识别的信号名称。在shell中说 kill -l 可以查看系统上的有效信号名称。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified a signal name to the kill() function that was not recognized. Say kill -l in your shell to see the valid signal names on your system.
trans-unit.target: （F）您为kill（）函数指定了无法识别的信号名称。在外壳程序中说 kill -l 以查看系统上的有效信号名称。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified an illegal option to Perl. Don't do that. (If you think you didn't do that, check the #! line to see if it's supplying the bad switch on your behalf.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您为Perl指定了非法选项。不要那样做 （如果您认为自己没有这样做，请检查＃！行，看看它是否代表您提供了错误的开关。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified an unknown Unicode option. See perlrun documentation of the -C switch for the list of known options.
trans-unit.target: （F）您指定了未知的Unicode选项。有关已知选项的列表，请参见 -C 开关的perlrun文档。

trans-unit.source: (F) You specified an unknown Unicode option. See perlrun documentation of the -C switch for the list of known options.
trans-unit.target: （F）您指定了未知的Unicode选项。有关已知选项的列表，请参见 -C 开关的perlrun文档。

trans-unit.source: (F) You started a regular expression with a quantifier. Backslash it if you meant it literally. The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered. See perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）您以量词开始了一个正则表达式。如果您是按字面意思说，请反斜杠。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) You started to name a symbol by using a package prefix, and then didn't finish the symbol. In particular, you can't interpolate outside of quotes, so
trans-unit.target: （F）您开始使用包前缀来命名符号，然后没有完成该符号。特别是，您不能在引号之外进行插值，因此

trans-unit.source: (F) You supplied a number to the -C option that either has extra leading zeroes or overflows perl's unsigned integer representation.
trans-unit.target: （F）您为-C选项提供了一个数字，该数字要么带有额外的前导零，要么溢出perl的无符号整数表示形式。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried compressing an infinity or not-a-number as an unsigned integer with BER, which makes no sense.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用BER将无穷大或非数字压缩为无符号整数，这没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried converting an infinity or not-a-number to an integer, which makes no sense.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试将无穷大或非数字转换为整数，这没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried printing an infinity or not-a-number as a character (%c), which makes no sense. Maybe you meant '%s', or just stringifying it?
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试将无穷大或非数字作为字符（％c）打印，这没有任何意义。也许您是说'％s'，或只是将其串化？

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to mro::set_mro("classname", "foo") or use mro 'foo' , where foo is not a valid method resolution order (MRO). Currently, the only valid ones supported are dfs and c3 , unless you have loaded a module that is a MRO plugin. See mro and perlmroapi.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用 mro::set_mro("classname", "foo") 或 use mro 'foo' ，其中 foo 不是有效的方法解析顺序（MRO）。当前，除非已加载作为MRO插件的模块，否则仅支持 dfs 和 c3 。参见mro和perlmroapi。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to mro::set_mro("classname", "foo") or use mro 'foo', where foo is not a valid method resolution order (MRO). Currently, the only valid ones supported are dfs and c3, unless you have loaded a module that is a MRO plugin. See mro and perlmroapi.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试了 mro::set_mro("classname", "foo") 或 use mro 'foo' ，其中 foo 不是有效的方法解析顺序（MRO）。当前，唯一受支持的是 dfs 和 c3 ，除非您已加载了一个MRO插件模块。参见mro和perlmroapi。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to access a key from a hash through the indicated typed variable but that key is not allowed by the package of the same type. The indicated package has restricted the set of allowed keys using the fields pragma.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图通过指示的类型化变量从哈希访问键，但是相同类型的包不允许该键。指示的软件包使用字段 pragma 限制了允许的密钥集。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to activate a source filter (usually by loading a source filter module) within a string passed to eval. This is not permitted under the unicode_eval feature. Consider using evalbytes instead. See feature.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在传递给 eval 的字符串中激活源过滤器（通常通过加载源过滤器模块）。 unicode_eval 功能不允许这样做。考虑改用 evalbytes 。请参阅功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to activate a source filter (usually by loading a source filter module) within a string passed to eval. This is not permitted under the unicode_eval feature. Consider using evalbytes instead. See feature.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在传递给 eval 的字符串中激活源过滤器（通常通过加载源过滤器模块）。 unicode_eval 功能不允许这样做。考虑改用 evalbytes 。请参阅功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign a reference to a non integer to $/ . In older Perls this would have behaved similarly to setting it to a reference to a positive integer, where the integer was the address of the reference. As of Perl 5.20.0 this is a fatal error, to allow future versions of Perl to use non-integer refs for more interesting purposes.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图将对非整数的引用分配给 $/ 。在较早的Perls中，其行为类似于将其设置为对正整数的引用，其中整数是引用的地址。从Perl 5.20.0开始，这是一个致命错误，它允许将来的Perl版本使用非整数引用来达到更有趣的目的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign a reference to a non integer to $/. In older Perls this would have behaved similarly to setting it to a reference to a positive integer, where the integer was the address of the reference. As of Perl 5.20.0 this is a fatal error, to allow future versions of Perl to use non-integer refs for more interesting purposes.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图将对非整数的引用分配给 $/ 。在较早的Perls中，其行为类似于将其设置为对正整数的引用，其中整数是引用的地址。从Perl 5.20.0开始，这是一个致命错误，它允许将来的Perl版本使用非整数引用来达到更有趣的目的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign a reference to a reference constructor, but the two references were not of the same type. You cannot alias a scalar to an array, or an array to a hash; the two types must match.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试将引用分配给引用构造函数，但是两个引用的类型不同。您不能将标量别名为数组，也不能将数组别名为哈希。两种类型必须匹配。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign something that was not a reference to an lvalue reference (e.g., \$x = $y ). If you meant to make $x an alias to $y, use \$x = \$y .
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配一个不是左值引用的引用（例如 \$x = $y ）。如果要使$ x成为$ y的别名，请使用 \$x = \$y 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign something that was not a reference to an lvalue reference (e.g., \$x = $y). If you meant to make $x an alias to $y, use \$x = \$y.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配不是对左值引用的引用的某些内容（例如 \$x = $y ）。如果要让$ x成为$ y的别名，请使用 \$x = \$y 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $> , and your operating system doesn't support the seteuid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试分配给 $> ，并且您的操作系统不支持seteuid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $>, and your operating system doesn't support the seteuid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配给 $> ，并且您的操作系统不支持seteuid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $< , and your operating system doesn't support the setruid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试分配给 $< ，并且您的操作系统不支持setruid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $<, and your operating system doesn't support the setruid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试分配给 $< ，并且您的操作系统不支持setruid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $( , and your operating system doesn't support the setrgid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试分配给 $( ，并且您的操作系统不支持setrgid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $(, and your operating system doesn't support the setrgid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配给 $( ，并且您的操作系统不支持setrgid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $) , and your operating system doesn't support the setegid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配给 $) ，并且您的操作系统不支持setegid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to assign to $), and your operating system doesn't support the setegid() system call (or equivalent), or at least Configure didn't think so.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图分配给 $) ，并且您的操作系统不支持setegid（）系统调用（或等效方法），或者至少Configure并不这么认为。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call a subroutine in the CORE:: namespace with &foo syntax or through a reference. Some subroutines in this package cannot yet be called that way, but must be called as barewords. Something like this will work:
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用 &foo 语法或通过引用在 CORE:: 名称空间中调用子例程。该软件包中的某些子例程尚不能以这种方式调用，但必须称为裸字。这样的事情会起作用：

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call a subroutine with goto &sub syntax, but the indicated subroutine hasn't been defined, or if it was, it has since been undefined.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用 goto &sub 语法调用子例程，但是尚未定义所指示的子例程，或者如果已定义，则此子例程尚未定义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call a subroutine with goto &sub syntax, but the indicated subroutine hasn't been defined, or if it was, it has since been undefined.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用 goto &sub 语法调用子例程，但是尚未定义所指示的子例程，或者如果已定义，则此子例程尚未定义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call perl with the -e switch, but
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用-e开关调用perl ，但是

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call perl with the -m switch, but you put something other than "=" after the module name.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用-m开关调用perl ，但在模块名称后放置了“ =”以外的内容。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call require or do with no argument or with an undefined value as an argument. Require expects either a package name or a file-specification as an argument; do expects a filename. See "require EXPR" in perlfunc and "do EXPR" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试调用require或do而不使用任何参数或使用未定义的值作为参数。Require期望将软件包名称或文件规范作为参数；确实需要一个文件名。见在perlfunc“要求EXPR”，并在perlfunc“做EXPR”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to call require with no argument or with an undefined value as an argument. Require expects either a package name or a file-specification as an argument. See require.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图不带任何参数或以未定义的值作为参数来调用require。Require期望将软件包名称或文件规范作为参数。参见require。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to create a custom alias for a character name, with the :alias option to use charnames and the specified character in the indicated name isn't valid. See CUSTOM ALIASES in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图为一个字符的名称创建一个自定义的别名，用 :alias 选项 use charnames ，并在指定名称的指定字符无效。请参阅字符名称中的自定义别名。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to create a custom alias for a character name, with the :alias option to use charnames and the specified character in the indicated name isn't valid. See "CUSTOM ALIASES" in charnames.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试 use charnames :alias 选项创建字符名称的自定义别名，以使用字符名称，并且指定名称中的指定字符无效。请参见字符名称中的“自定义别名”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to create a hash containing a very large key, where "very large" means that it needs at least 2 gigabytes to store. Unfortunately, Perl doesn't yet handle such large hash keys. You should reconsider your design to avoid hashing such a long string directly.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图创建一个包含非常大密钥的哈希，其中“非常大”意味着它至少需要2 GB的存储空间。不幸的是，Perl尚未处理如此大的哈希键。您应该重新考虑您的设计，以避免直接散列如此长的字符串。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to declare a magical variable as a lexical variable. This is not allowed, because the magic can be tied to only one location (namely the global variable) and it would be incredibly confusing to have variables in your program that looked like magical variables but weren't.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图将一个魔术变量声明为词汇变量。这是不允许的，因为魔术只能绑定到一个位置（即全局变量），而且程序中的变量看起来像魔术变量，但实际上不是，这会令人难以置信。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to define a customized To-mapping for lc(), lcfirst, uc(), or ucfirst() (or their string-inlined versions), but you specified an illegal mapping. See "User-Defined Character Properties" in perlunicode.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图为lc（），lcfirst，uc（）或ucfirst（）（或其内联字符串的版本）定义自定义的To-mapping，但是您指定了非法映射。请参见perlunicode中的“用户定义的字符属性”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to define a customized To-mapping for lc(), lcfirst, uc(), or ucfirst() (or their string-inlined versions), but you specified an illegal mapping. See User-Defined Character Properties in perlunicode.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图为lc（），lcfirst，uc（）或ucfirst（）（或其内联字符串的版本）定义自定义的To-mapping，但是您指定了非法映射。请参见perlunicode中的用户定义字符属性。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to divide a number by 0 to get the remainder. Most numbers don't take to this kindly.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图将数字除以0以得到余数。大多数数字对此并不友好。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to divide a number by 0. Either something was wrong in your logic, or you need to put a conditional in to guard against meaningless input.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图将数字除以0。或者您的逻辑有误，或者您需要添加条件以防止无意义的输入。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to do a read/write/send/recv operation with a buffer length that is less than 0. This is difficult to imagine.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图用小于0的缓冲区长度执行读/写/发送/接收操作。这很难想象。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to do something that the tainting mechanism didn't like. The tainting mechanism is turned on when you're running setuid or setgid, or when you specify -T to turn it on explicitly. The tainting mechanism labels all data that's derived directly or indirectly from the user, who is considered to be unworthy of your trust. If any such data is used in a "dangerous" operation, you get this error. See perlsec for more information.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图做一些污染机制不喜欢的事情。当您运行setuid或setgid时，或者当您指定-T显式打开它时，将打开污染机制。污染机制会标记直接或间接从用户那里获得的所有数据，这些用户被认为不值得您信任。如果在“危险”操作中使用了任何此类数据，则会出现此错误。有关更多信息，请参见perlsec。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to do something with a function beginning with "sem", "shm", or "msg" but that System V IPC is not implemented in your machine. In some machines the functionality can exist but be unconfigured. Consult your system support.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用以“ sem”，“ shm”或“ msg”开头的功能执行某项操作，但您的计算机未实现System V IPC。在某些机器中，该功能可以存在但未配置。请咨询您的系统支持。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to load a file with use or require that failed to compile once already. Perl will not try to compile this file again unless you delete its entry from %INC. See require and %INC in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图加载文件， use 或 require 未能已经编译一次。Perl不会尝试再次编译该文件，除非您从％INC删除了它的条目。请参阅perlvar中的require和％INC。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to load a file with use or require that failed to compile once already. Perl will not try to compile this file again unless you delete its entry from %INC. See "require" in perlfunc and "%INC" in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图加载文件， use 或 require 未能已经编译一次。Perl不会尝试再次编译该文件，除非您从％INC删除了它的条目。请参见perlfunc中的“ require”和perlvar中的“％INC”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to make an array value spring into existence, and the subscript was probably negative, even counting from end of the array backwards.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使数组值出现，并且下标可能是负数，甚至从数组末尾算起也是如此。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to pack something that didn't comply with UTF-8 encoding rules and perl was unable to guess how to make more progress.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试打包不符合UTF-8编码规则的内容，而perl无法猜测如何取得更大的进步。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to repeat a constant value (often the undefined value) with an assignment operator, which implies modifying the value itself. Perhaps you need to copy the value to a temporary, and repeat that.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图用赋值运算符重复一个常数值（通常是未定义的值），这意味着修改了该值本身。也许您需要将值复制到一个临时文件，然后重复该操作。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to return a complete array or hash from an lvalue subroutine, but you called the subroutine in a way that made Perl think you meant to return only one value. You probably meant to write parentheses around the call to the subroutine, which tell Perl that the call should be in list context.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图从左值子例程返回完整的数组或哈希，但是您以使Perl认为只返回一个值的方式调用了子例程。您可能打算在对子例程的调用周围写上括号，该括号告诉Perl该调用应在列表上下文中。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to unpack something that didn't comply with UTF-8 encoding rules and perl was unable to guess how to make more progress.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试解压缩不符合UTF-8编码规则的内容，而perl无法猜测如何取得更大的进步。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use vec on a string containing a code point over 0xFF, which is nonsensical here.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在包含代码点超过0xFF的字符串上使用 vec ，这在这里是毫无意义的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use goto to reach a label that was too deeply nested for Perl to reach. Perl is doing you a favor by refusing.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用 goto 到达一个嵌套太深的标签，以至于Perl无法到达。Perl通过拒绝帮您一个忙。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use goto to reach a label that was too deeply nested for Perl to reach. Perl is doing you a favor by refusing.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用 goto 到达一个嵌套太深的标签，以至于Perl无法达到。Perl通过拒绝帮您一个忙。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use a function with a malformed prototype. The syntax of function prototypes is given a brief compile-time check for obvious errors like invalid characters. A more rigorous check is run when the function is called. Perhaps the function's author was trying to write a subroutine signature but didn't enable that feature first (use feature 'signatures' ), so the signature was instead interpreted as a bad prototype.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试将函数与格式错误的原型一起使用。对函数原型的语法进行了简短的编译时检查，以检查诸如无效字符之类的明显错误。调用该函数时，将执行更严格的检查。也许函数的作者试图编写一个子例程签名，但没有首先启用该功能（ use feature 'signatures' ），因此该签名被解释为错误的原型。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use a function with a malformed prototype. The syntax of function prototypes is given a brief compile-time check for obvious errors like invalid characters. A more rigorous check is run when the function is called. Perhaps the function's author was trying to write a subroutine signature but didn't enable that feature first (use feature 'signatures'), so the signature was instead interpreted as a bad prototype.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试将函数与格式错误的原型一起使用。对函数原型的语法进行了简短的编译时检查，以检查诸如无效字符之类的明显错误。调用该函数时，将执行更严格的检查。也许函数的作者试图编写一个子例程签名，但没有先启用该功能（ use feature 'signatures' ），所以该签名被认为是错误的原型。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use a hash as a reference, as in %foo->{"bar"} or %$ref->{"hello"} . Versions of perl <= 5.22.0 used to allow this syntax, but shouldn't have. This was deprecated in perl 5.6.1.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用哈希作为引用，如 %foo->{"bar"} 或 %$ref->{"hello"} 。perl <= 5.22.0的版本用于允许使用此语法，但不应使用。在perl 5.6.1中已弃用该功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use a hash as a reference, as in %foo->{"bar"} or %$ref->{"hello"}. Versions of perl <= 5.22.0 used to allow this syntax, but shouldn't have. This was deprecated in perl 5.6.1.
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试使用哈希作为引用，如 %foo->{"bar"} 或 %$ref->{"hello"} 。perl <= 5.22.0的版本用于允许使用此语法，但不应使用。在perl 5.6.1中已弃用该功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use an array as a reference, as in @foo->[23] or @$ref->[99] . Versions of perl <= 5.22.0 used to allow this syntax, but shouldn't have. This was deprecated in perl 5.6.1.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用数组作为引用，如 @$ref->[99] @foo->[23] 或@ $ ref- > [99]所示。perl <= 5.22.0的版本用于允许使用此语法，但不应使用。在perl 5.6.1中已弃用该功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use an array as a reference, as in @foo->[23] or @$ref->[99]. Versions of perl <= 5.22.0 used to allow this syntax, but shouldn't have. This was deprecated in perl 5.6.1.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用数组作为引用，如 @$ref->[99] @foo->[23] 或@ $ ref- > [99]中。perl <= 5.22.0的版本用于允许使用此语法，但不应使用。在perl 5.6.1中已弃用该功能。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use an operator from a Safe compartment in which it's disallowed. See Safe.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图从不允许使用的安全隔间中使用操作员。请参阅安全。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use in open() a PerlIO layer that does not exist, e.g. open(FH, ">:nosuchlayer", "somefile").
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在open（）中使用一个不存在的PerlIO层，例如open（FH，“>：nosuchlayer”，“ somefile”）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use one of the string bitwise operators (& or | or ^ or ~) on a string containing a code point over 0xFF. The string bitwise operators treat their operands as strings of bytes, and values beyond 0xFF are nonsensical in this context.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在包含0xFF以上代码点的字符串上使用字符串按位运算符之一（ & 或 | 或 ^ 或 ~ ）。字符串按位运算符将其操作数视为字节字符串，并且在这种情况下，超出0xFF的值是无意义的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use open() to associate a filehandle to a symbol (glob or scalar) that already holds a dirhandle. Since this idiom might render your code confusing, it was deprecated in Perl 5.10. As of Perl 5.28, it is a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用open（）将文件句柄与已经包含dirhandle的符号（全局或标量）关联。由于此惯用语可能会使您的代码混乱，因此在Perl 5.10中已弃用该惯用语。从Perl 5.28开始，这是一个致命错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use opendir() to associate a dirhandle to a symbol (glob or scalar) that already holds a filehandle. Since this idiom might render your code confusing, it was deprecated in Perl 5.10. As of Perl 5.28, it is a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图使用opendir（）将目录句柄与已经包含文件句柄的符号（全局或标量）关联。由于此惯用语可能会使您的代码混乱，因此在Perl 5.10中已弃用该惯用语。从Perl 5.28开始，这是一个致命错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried to use the empty pattern inside of a regex code block, for instance /(?{ s!!! })/, which resulted in re-executing the same pattern, which is an infinite loop which is broken by throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: （F）您试图在正则表达式代码块中使用空模式，例如 /(?{ s!!! })/ ，这导致重新执行相同的模式，这是一个无限循环，被引发异常。

trans-unit.source: (F) You tried, directly or indirectly, to change the value of a constant. You didn't, of course, try "2 = 1", because the compiler catches that. But an easy way to do the same thing is:
trans-unit.target: （F）您尝试直接或间接地更改常量的值。当然，您没有尝试“ 2 = 1”，因为编译器捕获了这一点。但是执行相同操作的一种简单方法是：

trans-unit.source: (F) You used \b{...} or \B{...} and the ... is not known to Perl. The current valid ones are given in "\b{}, \b, \B{}, \B" in perlrebackslash.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用 \b{...} 或 \B{...} ，而Perl不知道 ... 。当前有效的值在perlrebackslash的“ \ b {}，\ b，\ B {}，\ B”中给出。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used \b{...} or \B{...} and the ... is not known to Perl. The current valid ones are given in \b{}, \b, \B{}, \B in perlrebackslash.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用 \b{...} 或 \B{...} ，而Perl不知道 ... 。当前有效的值在perlrebackslash中的\ b {}，\ b，\ B {}，\ B中给出。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used \g0 or similar in a regular expression. You may refer to capturing parentheses only with strictly positive integers (normal backreferences) or with strictly negative integers (relative backreferences). Using 0 does not make sense.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在正则表达式中使用了 \g0 或类似的字符。您可以仅使用严格的正整数（正常的反向引用）或严格的负整数（相对的反向引用）来引用捕获括号。使用0没有意义。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used \p{} or \P{} but the character property by that name could not be found. Maybe you misspelled the name of the property? See Properties accessible through \p{} and \P{} in perluniprops for a complete list of available official properties.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 \p{} 或 \P{} 但找不到该名称的字符属性。也许您拼错了酒店的名称？有关可用的官方属性的完整列表，请参见perluniprops中可通过\ p {}和\ P {}访问的属性。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a backslash-character combination which is not recognized by Perl inside character classes. This is a fatal error when the character class is used within (?[ ]) .
trans-unit.target: （F）您在字符类中使用了Perl无法识别的反斜杠字符组合。在 (?[ ]) 使用字符类时，这是一个致命错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a backslash-character combination which is not recognized by Perl inside character classes. This is a fatal error when the character class is used within (?[ ]).
trans-unit.target: （F）您在字符类中使用了Perl无法识别的反斜杠字符组合。在 (?[ ]) 使用字符类时，这是一个致命错误。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a code point that is not allowed, because it is too large. Unicode only allows code points up to 0x10FFFF, but Perl allows much larger ones. Earlier versions of Perl allowed code points above IV_MAX (0x7FFFFFF on 32-bit platforms, 0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF on 64-bit platforms), however, this could possibly break the perl interpreter in some constructs, including causing it to hang in a few cases.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了不允许的代码点，因为它太大。Unicode只允许最大0x10FFFF的代码点，但是Perl允许更大的代码点。Perl的早期版本允许代码点高于IV_MAX（在32位平台上为0x7FFFFFF，在64位平台上为0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF），但是，这可能会在某些结构中破坏perl解释器，包括在某些情况下导致其挂起。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a construct that needs a colon and pattern argument. Supply these or check that you are using the right construct.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了需要冒号和模式参数的构造。提供这些或检查您使用的结构正确。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a declaration similar to my $x if 0. There has been a long-standing bug in Perl that causes a lexical variable not to be cleared at scope exit when its declaration includes a false conditional. Some people have exploited this bug to achieve a kind of static variable. Since we intend to fix this bug, we don't want people relying on this behavior. You can achieve a similar static effect by declaring the variable in a separate block outside the function, eg
trans-unit.target: （F） my $x if 0 使用类似于我的$ x的声明。Perl中存在一个长期存在的错误，当其声明包含错误的条件时，该错误会导致在作用域退出时不清除词法变量。有些人利用此错误来实现一种静态变量。由于我们打算修复此错误，因此我们不希望人们依赖此行为。您可以通过在函数外部的单独块中声明变量来实现类似的静态效果，例如

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a digit other than 0 or 1 in a binary number.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在二进制数中使用了0或1以外的数字。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern of the form (*...) but did not terminate the pattern with a ). Fix the pattern and retry.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 (*...) 形式的模式，但未使用 ) 终止该模式。修复模式并重试。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern of the form (*...:...) but did not terminate the pattern with a ). Fix the pattern and retry.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 (*...:...) 形式的模式，但未使用 ) 终止该模式。修复模式并重试。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern of the form (*VERB) but did not terminate the pattern with a ). Fix the pattern and retry.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 (*VERB) 形式的模式，但未使用 ) 终止该模式。修复模式并重试。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern of the form (*VERB:ARG) but did not terminate the pattern with a ). Fix the pattern and retry.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 (*VERB:ARG) 形式的模式，但未使用 ) 终止该模式。修复模式并重试。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern that nested too many EVAL calls without consuming any text. Restructure the pattern so that text is consumed.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了一个嵌套太多EVAL调用而不占用任何文本的模式。重组模式，以便使用文本。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern that references itself without consuming any input text. You should check the pattern to ensure that recursive patterns either consume text or fail.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了一种引用自己而不消耗任何输入文本的模式。您应该检查模式，以确保递归模式消耗文本或失败。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a pattern that uses too many nested subpattern calls without consuming any text. Restructure the pattern so text is consumed before the nesting limit is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用的模式使用过多的嵌套子模式调用，而不消耗任何文本。重组模式，以便在超出嵌套限制之前消耗文本。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a regular expression extension that doesn't make sense. The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered. This may happen when using the (?^...) construct to tell Perl to use the default regular expression modifiers, and you redundantly specify a default modifier. For other causes, see perlre.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了没有意义的正则表达式扩展名。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。当使用 (?^...) 构造告诉Perl使用默认的正则表达式修饰符，而您多余地指定了默认修饰符时，可能会发生这种情况。其他原因，请参见perlre。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a verb pattern that is not allowed an argument. Remove the argument or check that you are using the right verb.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了不允许作为参数的动词模式。删除参数或检查您使用的是正确的动词。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used a verb pattern that requires an argument. Supply an argument or check that you are using the right verb.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了需要参数的动词模式。提供一个参数或检查您使用的是正确的动词。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used an 8 or 9 in an octal number.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在八进制数字中使用了8或9。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used index/value array slice syntax (%array[...] ) as the argument to delete. You probably meant @array[...] with an @ symbol instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用索引/值数组切片语法（ %array[...] ）作为 delete 的参数。您可能用@符号代替 @array[...] 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used key/value hash slice syntax (%hash{...} ) as the argument to delete. You probably meant @hash{...} with an @ symbol instead.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用键/值哈希切片语法（ %hash{...} ）作为 delete 的参数。您可能用@符号代替 @hash{...} 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used local on a variable name that was previously declared as a lexical variable using "my" or "state". This is not allowed. If you want to localize a package variable of the same name, qualify it with the package name.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在变量名上使用了local，该变量名先前使用“ my”或“ state”声明为词法变量。这是不允许的。如果要本地化具有相同名称的程序包变量，请使用程序包名称对其进行限定。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like (?(DEFINE)...|..) which is illegal. The most likely cause of this error is that you left out a parenthesis inside of the .... part.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了类似 (?(DEFINE)...|..) 的非法内容。导致此错误的最可能原因是您在 .... 部分的内部省略了括号。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like \7 in your regular expression, but there are not at least seven sets of capturing parentheses in the expression. If you wanted to have the character with ordinal 7 inserted into the regular expression, prepend zeroes to make it three digits long: \007
trans-unit.target: （F）您在正则表达式中使用了 \7 类的东西，但是表达式中至少没有七组捕获括号。如果要在正则表达式中插入具有序数7​​的字符，请在数字前加上零使其长度为三位数： \007

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like \b{}, \B{}, \o{}, \p, \P, or \x without specifying anything for it to operate on.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了 \b{} ， \B{} ， \o{} ， \p ， \P 或 \x 东西，但未指定要对其进行操作的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like \g{-7} in your regular expression, but there are not at least seven sets of closed capturing parentheses in the expression before where the \g{-7} was located.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在正则表达式中使用了 \g{-7} 类的东西，但是在 \g{-7} 所在的位置中，表达式中至少没有七组封闭的捕获括号。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like \k'NAME' or \k<NAME> in your regular expression, but there is no corresponding named capturing parentheses such as (?'NAME'...) or (?<NAME>...) . Check if the name has been spelled correctly both in the backreference and the declaration.
trans-unit.target: [F）您在正则表达式中使用了 \k'NAME' 或 \k<NAME> 类的东西，但没有相应的命名捕获括号，例如 (?'NAME'...) 或 (?<NAME>...) 。检查名称是否在反向引用和声明中均正确拼写。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used something like \k'NAME' or \k<NAME> in your regular expression, but there is no corresponding named capturing parentheses such as (?'NAME'...) or (?<NAME>...). Check if the name has been spelled correctly both in the backreference and the declaration.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在正则表达式中使用了 \k'NAME' 或 \k<NAME> 类的东西，但是没有相应的命名捕获括号，例如 (?'NAME'...) 或 (?<NAME>...) 。检查名称是否在反向引用和声明中均正确拼写。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the -S switch, but the copies of the script to execute found in the PATH did not have correct permissions.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了-S开关，但是在PATH中找到的要执行的脚本副本没有正确的权限。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the -S switch, but the script to execute could not be found in the PATH, or at least not with the correct permissions. The script exists in the current directory, but PATH prohibits running it.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了-S开关，但是在PATH中找不到执行脚本，或者至少没有正确的权限。该脚本存在于当前目录中，但是PATH禁止运行它。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the -S switch, but the script to execute could not be found in the PATH.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了-S开关，但是在PATH中找不到要执行的脚本。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the obsolete dump() built-in function. That was deprecated in Perl 5.8.0. As of Perl 5.30 it must be written in fully qualified format: CORE::dump().
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了过时的 dump() 内置函数。在Perl 5.8.0中已弃用该功能。从Perl 5.30开始，它必须以完全合格的格式编写： CORE::dump() 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the syntax of a method call, but the slot filled by the object reference or package name contains an expression that returns a defined value which is neither an object reference nor a package name. Something like this will reproduce the error:
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了方法调用的语法，但是由对象引用或程序包名称填充的插槽包含一个表达式，该表达式返回一个既不是对象引用也不是程序包名称的定义值。这样的事情将重现该错误：

trans-unit.source: (F) You used the syntax of a method call, but the slot filled by the object reference or package name contains an undefined value. Something like this will reproduce the error:
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用了方法调用的语法，但是由对象引用或程序包名称填充的插槽包含未定义的值。这样的事情将重现该错误：

trans-unit.source: (F) You were using a wildcard subpattern a Unicode property value, and the subpattern contained something that is illegal. Not all regular expression capabilities are legal in such subpatterns, and this is one. Rewrite your subppattern to not use the offending construct. See "Wildcards in Property Values" in perlunicode.
trans-unit.target: （F）您使用通配符子模式使用Unicode属性值，并且该子模式包含非法内容。在这种子模式中，并非所有正则表达式功能都是合法的，这就是其中之一。重写您的子模式以不使用有问题的构造。请参见perlunicode中的“属性值中的通配符”。

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote bless $foo with one argument after somehow causing the current package to be freed. Perl cannot figure out what to do, so it throws up in hands in despair.
trans-unit.target: （F）在以某种方式导致当前程序包被释放后，您用一个参数写了 bless $foo 。Perl无法弄清楚该怎么办，因此它陷入绝望。

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote require <file> when you should have written require 'file' .
trans-unit.target: （F）当您应该编写 require 'file' '时，您编写了 require <file> 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote bless $foo with one argument after somehow causing the current package to be freed. Perl cannot figure out what to do, so it throws up its hands in despair.
trans-unit.target: （F）在以某种方式导致当前程序包被释放后，您用一个参数写了 bless $foo 。Perl无法弄清楚该做什么，因此它绝望地举起了手。

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote require <file> when you should have written require 'file'.
trans-unit.target: （F）当您应该编写 require 'file' 时，您编写了 require <file> 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote something like
trans-unit.target: （F）你写了类似

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote something like tr/a-z-0// which doesn't mean anything at all. To include a - character in a transliteration, put it either first or last. (In the past, tr/a-z-0// was synonymous with tr/a-y//, which was probably not what you would have expected.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您写了类似 tr/a-z-0// 东西，这根本没有任何意义。要在音译中包含 - 字符，请将其放在首尾。（过去， tr/a-z-0// 是 tr/a-y// 同义词，这可能与您期望的不一样。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You wrote something like tr/a-z-0// which doesn't mean anything at all. To include a - character in a transliteration, put it either first or last. (In the past, tr/a-z-0// was synonymous with tr/a-y//, which was probably not what you would have expected.)
trans-unit.target: （F）您写了类似 tr/a-z-0// 东西，这根本没有任何意义。要在音译中包含 - 字符，请将其放在第一位或最后一位。（过去， tr/a-z-0// 是 tr/a-y// 同义词，这可能与您期望的不一样。）

trans-unit.source: (F) You're on a system such as MS-DOS that gets confused if you try reading from a deleted (but still opened) file. You have to say -i.bak , or some such.
trans-unit.target: （F）您在诸如MS-DOS的系统上，如果尝试从已删除（但仍处于打开状态）的文件中进行读取，则会感到困惑。您必须说 -i.bak 或类似的东西。

trans-unit.source: (F) You're running under taint mode, and the %ENV variable has been aliased to another hash, so it doesn't reflect anymore the state of the program's environment. This is potentially insecure.
trans-unit.target: （F）您正在异味模式下运行，并且 %ENV 变量已别名为另一个哈希，因此它不再反映程序环境的状态。这可能是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've mixed up your reference types. You have to dereference a reference of the type needed. You can use the ref() function to test the type of the reference, if need be.
trans-unit.target: （F）您混合了参考类型。您必须取消引用所需类型的引用。如果需要，可以使用ref（）函数测试引用的类型。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've omitted the closing parenthesis in a function prototype definition.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经省略了函数原型定义中的右括号。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've said "use strict" or "use strict vars", which indicates that all variables must either be lexically scoped (using "my" or "state"), declared beforehand using "our", or explicitly qualified to say which package the global variable is in (using "::").
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经说过“使用严格”或“使用严格vars”，这表示所有变量必须在词法范围内（使用“ my”或“ state”），事先使用“我们的”声明或明确限定为说出全局变量在哪个包中（使用“ ::”）。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've told Perl to dereference a string, something which use strict blocks to prevent it happening accidentally. See Symbolic references in perlref. This can be triggered by an @ or $ in a double-quoted string immediately before interpolating a variable, for example in "user @$twitter_id" , which says to treat the contents of $twitter_id as an array reference; use a \ to have a literal @ symbol followed by the contents of $twitter_id : "user \@$twitter_id" .
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经告诉Perl取消引用字符串，该字符串 use strict 块来防止意外发生。请参见perlref中的符号引用。可以在插补变量之前用双引号引起来的 @ 或 $ 来触发此操作，例如在 "user @$twitter_id" ，该变量表示将 $twitter_id 的内容视为数组引用；使用 \ 带有文字 @ 符号，后跟 $twitter_id 的内容： "user \@$twitter_id" 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've told Perl to dereference a string, something which use strict blocks to prevent it happening accidentally. See "Symbolic references" in perlref. This can be triggered by an @ or $ in a double-quoted string immediately before interpolating a variable, for example in "user @$twitter_id", which says to treat the contents of $twitter_id as an array reference; use a \ to have a literal @ symbol followed by the contents of $twitter_id: "user \@$twitter_id".
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经告诉Perl取消引用字符串，该字符串 use strict 块来防止意外发生。请参见perlref中的“符号引用”。可以在插补变量之前用双引号引起来的 @ 或 $ 来触发此操作，例如在 "user @$twitter_id" ，该变量表示将 $twitter_id 的内容视为数组引用；使用 \ 来具有文字 @ 符号，后跟 $twitter_id 的内容： "user \@$twitter_id" 。

trans-unit.source: (F) You've used the /e switch to evaluate the replacement for a substitution, but perl found a syntax error in the code to evaluate, most likely an unexpected right brace '}'.
trans-unit.target: （F）您已经使用 /e 开关来评估替换项，但是perl在代码中发现了语法错误来进行评估，很可能是意外的右括号'}'。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your C library apparently doesn't implement gethostent(), probably because if it did, it'd feel morally obligated to return every hostname on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的C库显然没有实现gethostent（），这可能是因为这样做确实会导致道德上返回Internet上的每个主机名。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your Perl has not been configured to have PerlIO, and therefore you cannot use IO layers. To have PerlIO, Perl must be configured with 'useperlio'.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的Perl尚未配置为具有PerlIO，因此无法使用IO层。要拥有PerlIO，必须为Perl配置“ useperlio”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your format contains the ~~ repeat-until-blank sequence and a numeric field that will never go blank so that the repetition never terminates. You might use ^# instead. See perlform.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的格式包含~~ repeat-until-blank序列和一个数字字段，该字段永远不会为空，因此重复不会终止。您可以改用^＃。参见perlform。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine apparently doesn't implement fcntl(). What is this, a PDP-11 or something?
trans-unit.target: （F）您的计算机显然未实现fcntl（）。这是什么，PDP-11或什么？

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine apparently doesn't implement ioctl(), which is pretty strange for a machine that supports C.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的机器显然没有实现ioctl（），对于支持C的机器来说这很奇怪。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't implement a file truncation mechanism that Configure knows about.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的计算机未实现Configure知道的文件截断机制。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't implement the sockatmark() functionality, neither as a system call nor an ioctl call (SIOCATMARK).
trans-unit.target: （F）您的计算机没有实现sockatmark（）功能，既不是系统调用也不是ioctl调用（SIOCATMARK）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't implement the umask function and you tried to use it to restrict permissions for yourself (EXPR & 0700).
trans-unit.target: （F）您的计算机未实现umask函数，因此您尝试使用它来限制自己的权限（EXPR＆0700）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't support dump/undump.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的机器不支持转储/转储。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't support opendir() and readdir().
trans-unit.target: （F）您的机器不支持opendir（）和readdir（）。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your machine doesn't support the Berkeley socket mechanism, or at least that's what Configure thought.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的计算机不支持Berkeley套接字机制，或者至少这是Configure的想法。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your perl script appears to have changed directory while performing an in-place edit of a file specified by a relative path, and your system doesn't include the directory relative POSIX functions needed to handle that.
trans-unit.target: （F）在对由相对路径指定的文件执行就地编辑时，您的perl脚本似乎已更改目录，并且您的系统不包括处理该目录所需的相对于POSIX函数的目录。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your platform has very uncommon byte-order and integer size, so it was not possible to set up some or all fixed-width byte-order conversion functions. This is only a problem when you're using the '<' or '>' modifiers in (un)pack templates. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的平台的字节序和整数大小非常少见，因此无法设置某些或所有固定宽度的字节序转换功能。只有在（un）pack模板中使用'<'或'>'修饰符时，这才是问题。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your platform has very uncommon byte-order and integer size, so it was not possible to set up some or all fixed-width byte-order conversion functions. This is only a problem when you're using the '<' or '>' modifiers in (un)pack templates. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的平台的字节序和整数大小非常少见，因此无法设置某些或所有固定宽度的字节序转换功能。仅当在（un）pack模板中使用'<'或'>'修饰符时，这才是问题。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your platform's byte-order is neither big-endian nor little-endian, or it has a very strange pointer size. Packing and unpacking big- or little-endian floating point values and pointers may not be possible. See pack.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的平台的字节顺序既不是big-endian也不是little-endian，或者它的指针大小非常奇怪。可能无法打包大端或小端浮点值和指针。参见pack。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your platform's byte-order is neither big-endian nor little-endian, or it has a very strange pointer size. Packing and unpacking big- or little-endian floating point values and pointers may not be possible. See "pack" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的平台的字节顺序既不是big-endian也不是little-endian，或者它的指针大小非常奇怪。可能无法打包大尾数或小尾数浮点值和指针。请参阅perlfunc中的“ pack”。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your program file begins with a Unicode Byte Order Mark (BOM) which declares it to be in a Unicode encoding that Perl cannot read.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的程序文件以Unicode字节顺序标记（BOM）开头，该文件声明其为Perl无法读取的Unicode编码。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your regular expression used \K in a lookhead or lookbehind assertion, which isn't permitted.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的正则表达式在标头或后置断言中使用 \K ，这是不允许的。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your system has POSIX getpgrp(), which takes no argument, unlike the BSD version, which takes a pid.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的系统具有POSIX getpgrp（），它不带任何参数，这与BSD版本的带pid不同。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your system has the setpgrp() from BSD 4.2, which takes no arguments, unlike POSIX setpgid(), which takes a process ID and process group ID.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的系统具有BSD 4.2中的setpgrp（），它不带任何参数，这与POSIX setpgid（）不同，后者带一个进程ID和一个进程组ID。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your template contains ()-groups with a ridiculously deep nesting level.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的模板包含（）-组，其嵌套级别非常高。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your version of executable does not support forking.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的可执行文件版本不支持分支。

trans-unit.source: (F) Your version of the C library apparently doesn't do times(). I suspect you're not running on Unix.
trans-unit.target: （F）您的C库版本显然不执行times（）。我怀疑您不是在Unix上运行。

trans-unit.source: (F) defined() is not useful on arrays because it checks for an undefined
trans-unit.target: （F）define（）在数组上没有用，因为它检查未定义的

trans-unit.source: (F) msgsnd() requires a string at least as long as sizeof(long).
trans-unit.target: [F）msgsnd（）要求的字符串至少与sizeof（long）一样长。

trans-unit.source: (F)(P) Error resolving overloading specified by a method name (as opposed to a subroutine reference): no such method callable via the package. If the method name is ???, this is an internal error.
trans-unit.target: （F）（P）解决由方法名称（与子例程引用相对）指定的重载的错误：无法通过包调用此类方法。如果方法名称为 ??? ， 这是一个内部错误。

trans-unit.source: (F)(W layer) You tried to do a read/write/send/recv/seek operation with an offset pointing outside the buffer. This is difficult to imagine. The sole exceptions to this are that zero padding will take place when going past the end of the string when either sysread()ing a file, or when seeking past the end of a scalar opened for I/O (in anticipation of future reads and to imitate the behavior with real files).
trans-unit.target: [F] [W层）您尝试使用指向缓冲区外部的偏移量执行读/写/发送/接收/查找操作。这很难想象。唯一的例外是，当 sysread() 写入文件时，或在经过I / O打开的标量的末尾时（预期将来会进行读取和读取），在字符串末尾进行零填充将是零。模仿真实文件的行为）。

trans-unit.source: (F)(W layer) You tried to do a read/write/send/recv/seek operation with an offset pointing outside the buffer. This is difficult to imagine. The sole exceptions to this are that zero padding will take place when going past the end of the string when either sysread()ing a file, or when seeking past the end of a scalar opened for I/O (in anticipation of future reads and to imitate the behavior with real files).
trans-unit.target: [F] [W层）您尝试使用指向缓冲区外部的偏移量执行读/写/发送/接收/查找操作。这很难想象。唯一的例外是，当 sysread() 写入文件时，或者在经过为I / O打开的标量的结尾时（预期将来进行读取和读取），在到达字符串末尾时将进行零填充。模仿真实文件的行为）。

trans-unit.source: (From the security viewpoint, testing for permissions before attempting to do something is silly anyway: if one tries this, there is potential for race conditions. Someone or something might change the permissions between the permissions check and the actual operation. Just try the operation.)
trans-unit.target: （从安全的角度来看，尝试做某事之前对权限进行测试是很愚蠢的：如果尝试这样做，则有潜在的竞争条件。某人或某物可能会在权限检查和实际操作之间更改权限。只需尝试操作）

trans-unit.source: (If a curly bracket occurs in any other context and does not form part of a backslashed sequence like \x{...} , it is treated as a regular character. However, a deprecation warning is raised for all such occurrences, and in Perl v5.26, literal uses of a curly bracket will be required to be escaped, say by preceding them with a backslash ("\{" ) or enclosing them within square brackets ("[{]" ). This change will allow for future syntax extensions (like making the lower bound of a quantifier optional), and better error checking of quantifiers.)
trans-unit.target: （如果大括号在任何其他上下文中出现，并且不构成反斜杠序列的一部分，如 \x{...} ，则将其视为常规字符。但是，对于所有此类情况，都会引发弃用警告，并且在在Perl v5.26中，必须转义大括号的使用，例如在大括号前加上反斜杠（ "\{" ）或将其括在方括号（ "[{]" ）之内。将来的语法扩展（例如使量词的下限为可选），以及对量词进行更好的错误检查。）

trans-unit.source: (If a non-escaped curly bracket occurs in a context other than one of the quantifiers listed above, where it does not form part of a backslashed sequence like \x{...}, it is either a fatal syntax error, or treated as a regular character, generally with a deprecation warning raised. To escape it, you can precede it with a backslash ("\{") or enclose it within square brackets ("[{]"). This change will allow for future syntax extensions (like making the lower bound of a quantifier optional), and better error checking of quantifiers).
trans-unit.target: （如果非转义大括号出现在除上述所列量词之一之外的上下文中，则它不构成反斜杠序列的一部分，例如 \x{...} ，这可能是致命的语法错误，也可能是致命错误作为常规字符，通常会发出弃用警告。要对其进行转义，可以在其前面加上反斜杠（ "\{" ）或将其括在方括号（ "[{]" ）中。此更改将允许将来使用语法扩展（例如使量词的下限为可选），以及对量词进行更好的错误检查）。

trans-unit.source: (In Perls earlier than 5.8.1 the -C switch was a Win32-only switch that enabled the use of Unicode-aware "wide system call" Win32 APIs. This feature was practically unused, however, and the command line switch was therefore "recycled".)
trans-unit.target: （在5.8.1之前的Perls中，-C开关是一个仅Win32的开关，它允许使用支持Unicode的“系统调用” Win32 API。但是，此功能实际上未使用，因此命令行开关是“回收”。）

trans-unit.source: (Internal) debug options, probably only useful if -r included. The t option prints the object on the top of the stack as it's being tracked. The O option prints each operator as it's being processed in the execution order of the program.
trans-unit.target: （内部）调试选项，仅在包含 -r 时才有用。该 t 选项打印对象的堆栈的顶部，因为它是被跟踪。所述 O 因为它在程序的执行顺序被处理选项打印每个操作员。

trans-unit.source: (On EBCDIC platforms, Perl uses instead UTF-EBCDIC, which is a form of UTF-8 adapted for EBCDIC platforms. Below, we just talk about UTF-8. UTF-EBCDIC is like UTF-8, but the details are different. The macros hide the differences from you, just remember that the particular numbers and bit patterns presented below will differ in UTF-EBCDIC.)
trans-unit.target: （在EBCDIC平台上，Perl改用UTF-EBCDIC，这是适用于EBCDIC平台的UTF-8形式。下面，我们仅讨论UTF-8。UTF-EBCDIC类似于UTF-8，但是细节有所不同。宏向您隐藏了差异，请记住以下呈现的特定数字和位模式在UTF-EBCDIC中会有所不同。）

trans-unit.source: (On systems that provide a handle for the loaded object such as SunOS and HPUX, $libref will be that handle. On other systems $libref will typically be $filename or a pointer to a buffer containing $filename. The application should not examine or alter $libref in any way.)
trans-unit.target: （在提供诸如SunOS和HPUX之类的已加载对象句柄的系统上，$ libref将是该句柄。在其他系统上，$ libref通常将是$ filename或指向包含$ filename的缓冲区的指针。应用程序不应检查或以任何方式更改$ libref。）
