trans-unit.target: （可选。）完全刷新缓存。

trans-unit.source: (P) PerlIO_getname , a perl internal I/O function specific to VMS, was somehow called on another platform. This should not happen.
trans-unit.target: （P） PerlIO_getname 是VMS 专有的perl内部I / O函数，在另一个平台上被以某种方式调用。这不应该发生。

trans-unit.source: (P) PerlIO_getname, a perl internal I/O function specific to VMS, was somehow called on another platform. This should not happen.
trans-unit.target: （P） PerlIO_getname 是专用于VMS的perl内部I / O函数，在另一个平台上以某种方式被调用。这不应该发生。

trans-unit.source: (P) A "can't happen" error, because safemalloc() should have caught it earlier.
trans-unit.target: （P）一个“不可能发生”错误，因为safemalloc（）应该更早地捕获了它。

trans-unit.source: (P) A child pseudo-process in the ithreads implementation on Windows was not scheduled within the time period allowed and therefore was not able to initialize properly.
trans-unit.target: （P）Windows的ithreads实现中的子伪进程未在允许的时间内安排，因此无法正确初始化。

trans-unit.source: (P) A dynamic loading library .so or .dll was being loaded into the process that was built against a different build of perl than the said library was compiled against. Reinstalling the XS module will likely fix this error.
trans-unit.target: （P）正在将动态加载库 .so 或 .dll 加载到针对与编译该库不同的perl版本构建的进程中。重新安装XS模块可能会解决此错误。

trans-unit.source: (P) A writable lexical variable became read-only somehow within the scope.
trans-unit.target: （P）可写词法变量在范围内以某种方式变为只读。

trans-unit.source: (P) A zero scratch pad offset was detected internally. An attempt was made to free a target that had not been allocated to begin with.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部检测到零刮擦偏移。试图释放尚未分配的目标。

trans-unit.source: (P) A zero scratch pad offset was detected internally. Most likely an operator needed a target but that target had not been allocated for whatever reason.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部检测到零刮擦偏移。操作员很可能需要一个目标，但是出于任何原因都没有分配该目标。

trans-unit.source: (P) An attempt was made to realloc NULL.
trans-unit.target: （P）试图重新分配NULL。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to OS/2. Most probably you're using an obsolete version of Perl, and this should not happen anyway.
trans-unit.target: （P）OS / 2特有的错误。很可能您正在使用Perl的过时版本，无论如何都不会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. After creating a mailbox to act as a pipe, Perl can't retrieve its name for later use.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。创建邮箱作为管道后，Perl无法检索其名称以供以后使用。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl asked $GETSYI how big you want your mailbox buffers to be, and didn't get an answer.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。Perl问$ GETSYI您希望邮箱缓冲区有多大，但没有得到答案。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl does its own command line redirection, and couldn't open the pipe into which to send data destined for stdout.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。Perl进行自己的命令行重定向，并且无法打开将发送到stdout的数据发送到的管道。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl thought stdin was a pipe, and tried to reopen it to accept binary data. Alas, it failed.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。Perl认为stdin是一个管道，并试图重新打开它以接受二进制数据。las，失败了。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. Perl was reading values for %ENV before iterating over it, and someone else stuck a message in the stream of data Perl expected. Someone's very confused, or perhaps trying to subvert Perl's population of %ENV for nefarious purposes.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。Perl在对其进行迭代之前正在读取％ENV的值，并且其他人在Perl期望的数据流中粘贴了一条消息。有人很困惑，或者出于邪恶目的试图破坏Perl的％ENV。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. Something untoward happened in a VMS system service or RTL routine; Perl's exit status should provide more details. The filename in "at %s" and the line number in "line %d" tell you which section of the Perl source code is distressed.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。VMS系统服务或RTL例程中发生了不可思议的事情；Perl的退出状态应提供更多详细信息。“ ats％s”中的文件名和“ line％d”中的行号告诉您Perl源代码的哪一部分令人苦恼。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. The internal routine my_pclose() tried to close a pipe which hadn't been opened. This should have been caught earlier as an attempt to close an unopened filehandle.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。内部例程my_pclose（）试图关闭尚未打开的管道。尝试关闭未打开的文件句柄时，应该早已捕获到该错误。

trans-unit.source: (P) An error peculiar to VMS. The process is suffering from exhausted quotas or other plumbing problems.
trans-unit.target: （P）VMS特有的错误。该过程遭受配额用尽或其他管道问题的困扰。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal error.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部错误。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal request asked to add a dirhandle entry to something that wasn't a symbol table entry.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部请求，要求向不是符号表条目的对象添加目录句柄条目。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal request asked to add a filehandle entry to something that wasn't a symbol table entry.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部请求，要求将文件句柄条目添加到不是符号表条目的内容中。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal request asked to add a hash entry to something that wasn't a symbol table entry.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部请求，要求将哈希条目添加到不是符号表条目的内容中。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal request asked to add a scalar entry to something that wasn't a symbol table entry.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部请求，要求将标量条目添加到不是符号表条目的内容中。

trans-unit.source: (P) An internal request asked to add an array entry to something that wasn't a symbol table entry.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部请求，要求将数组条目添加到不是符号表条目的内容中。

trans-unit.source: (P) An invalid scratch pad offset was detected internally.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部检测到无效的暂存器偏移量。

trans-unit.source: (P) Failed an internal consistency check trying to compile a grep.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试编译grep的内部一致性检查失败。

trans-unit.source: (P) Failed an internal consistency check trying to compile a split.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试编译拆分的内部一致性检查失败。

trans-unit.source: (P) Failed an internal consistency check while trying to reset a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试重置弱引用时，内部一致性检查失败。

trans-unit.source: (P) Failed an internal consistency check while trying to reset all weak references to an object.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试重置对对象的所有弱引用时，内部一致性检查失败。

trans-unit.source: (P) For some reason you can't check the filesystem of the script for nosuid.
trans-unit.target: （P）由于某种原因，您无法检查脚本文件系统中的nosuid。

trans-unit.source: (P) For some reason you can't fstat() the script even though you have it open already. Bizarre.
trans-unit.target: （P）由于某种原因，即使您已经打开脚本，也无法fstat（）。奇怪

trans-unit.source: (P) It is currently not permitted to load modules when creating a filehandle inside an %INC hook. This can happen with open my $fh, '<', \$scalar , which implicitly loads PerlIO::scalar. Try loading PerlIO::scalar explicitly first.
trans-unit.target: （P）当前不允许在％INC挂钩内创建文件句柄时加载模块。 open my $fh, '<', \$scalar 可能会发生这种情况，这会隐式加载PerlIO :: scalar。尝试先显式加载PerlIO :: scalar。

trans-unit.source: (P) It is currently not permitted to load modules when creating a filehandle inside an %INC hook. This can happen with open my $fh, '<', \$scalar, which implicitly loads PerlIO::scalar. Try loading PerlIO::scalar explicitly first.
trans-unit.target: （P）当前不允许在％INC挂钩内创建文件句柄时加载模块。 open my $fh, '<', \$scalar 可能会发生这种情况，这会隐式加载PerlIO :: scalar。尝试先显式加载PerlIO :: scalar。

trans-unit.source: (P) One of the file test operators entered a code branch that calls an ACL related-function, but that function is not available on this platform. Earlier checks mean that it should not be possible to enter this branch on this platform.
trans-unit.target: （P）一个文件测试操作员进入一个代码分支，该分支调用ACL相关功能，但是该功能在该平台上不可用。较早的检查意味着不应在此平台上进入此分支。

trans-unit.source: (P) One of the internal hash routines was passed a null HV pointer.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部哈希例程之一传递了一个空HV指针。

trans-unit.source: (P) Overloading resolution over @ISA tree may be broken by importation stubs. Stubs should never be implicitly created, but explicit calls to can may break this.
trans-unit.target: （P）输入存根可能会破坏@ISA树上的重载分辨率。绝对不能隐式地创建存根，但是对的显式调用 can 会破坏这一点。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl detected an attempt to copy a value to an internal type that cannot be directly assigned to.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl检测到尝试将值复制到无法直接分配给内部类型的尝试。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl detected an attempt to copy an internal value that is not copiable.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl检测到尝试复制不可复制的内部值的尝试。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl got confused as to whether a hash was a plain hash or a symbol table hash when trying to update @ISA caches.
trans-unit.target: （P）当试图更新@ISA缓存时，Perl对于哈希是普通哈希还是符号表哈希感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl tried to force the upgrade of an SV to a type which was actually inferior to its current type.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl试图强制将SV升级到实际上不如其当前类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl was about to print an error message in $@ , but the $@ variable did not exist, even after an attempt to create it.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl即将在 $@ 打印一条错误消息，但是即使尝试创建 $@ 变量，该变量也不存在。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl was about to print an error message in $@, but the $@ variable did not exist, even after an attempt to create it.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl即将在 $@ 打印一条错误消息，但是 $@ 变量不存在，即使在尝试创建它之后也是如此。

trans-unit.source: (P) Perl's I/O implementation failed an internal consistency check. If you see this message, something is very wrong.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl的I / O实现未通过内部一致性检查。如果您看到此消息，则说明存在很大问题。

trans-unit.source: (P) Some internal routine requested a goto (or something like it), and didn't supply the destination.
trans-unit.target: （P）一些内部例程要求转到（或类似的东西），但没有提供目的地。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something requested a negative number of bytes of malloc.
trans-unit.target: （P）某些请求的malloc字节为负数。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something requested a negative number of bytes of realloc.
trans-unit.target: （P）某些请求重新分配的字节数为负。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something terrible went wrong in setting up for the split.
trans-unit.target: （P）设置拆分时发生了可怕的错误。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something tried to allocate either more memory than possible or a negative amount.
trans-unit.target: （P）某种东西试图分配比可能更多的内存或负数。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something tried to call utf16_to_utf8 with an odd (as opposed to even) byte length.
trans-unit.target: （P）某些东西试图以奇数（而不是偶数）字节长度调用utf16_to_utf8。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something tried to call utf16_to_utf8_reversed with an odd (as opposed to even) byte length.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试用一个奇数（而不是偶数）字节长度调用utf16_to_utf8_reversed。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something went badly awry in the regular expression parser. The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered.
trans-unit.target: （P）在正则表达式解析器中出现了严重问题。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something went badly wrong in the regular expression parser. The <-- HERE shows whereabouts in the regular expression the problem was discovered.
trans-unit.target: （P）在正则表达式解析器中出现严重错误。<-HERE在正则表达式中显示发现问题的行踪。

trans-unit.source: (P) Something went wrong internally when Perl was trying to look up Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: （P）当Perl尝试查找Unicode字符时，内部发生了问题。

trans-unit.source: (P) The attempt to translate a use Module n.n LIST statement into its equivalent BEGIN block found an internal inconsistency with the version number.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试将 use Module n.n LIST 语句转换为等效的 BEGIN 块，发现内部与版本号不一致。

trans-unit.source: (P) The attempt to translate a use Module n.n LIST statement into its equivalent BEGIN block found an internal inconsistency with the version number.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试将 use Module n.n LIST 语句转换为等效的 BEGIN 块，发现与版本号存在内部不一致。

trans-unit.source: (P) The compiler attempted to do a goto, or something weird like that.
trans-unit.target: （P）编译器尝试执行goto或类似的操作。

trans-unit.source: (P) The compiler got confused about which scratch pad it was allocating and freeing temporaries and lexicals from.
trans-unit.target: （P）编译器对于正在分配哪个暂存器并从中释放临时单词和词汇感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: (P) The compiler is screwed up and attempted to use an op that isn't permitted at run time.
trans-unit.target: （P）编译器被搞砸了，并尝试使用运行时不允许的op。

trans-unit.source: (P) The foreach iterator got called in a non-loop context frame.
trans-unit.target: （P）在非循环上下文框架中调用了foreach迭代器。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal do_trans routines were called with invalid operational data.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部do_trans例程使用无效的操作数据调用。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal handling of magical variables has been cursed.
trans-unit.target: （P）魔法变量的内部处理已受到诅咒。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal pattern matching routines are out of their gourd.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部模式匹配例程超出了他们的要求。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal pattern matching routines blew it big time.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部模式匹配例程花费了很多时间。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal pp_match() routine was called with invalid operational data.
trans-unit.target: （P）使用无效的操作数据调用了内部pp_match（）例程。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal pp_subst() routine was called with invalid operational data.
trans-unit.target: （P）使用无效的操作数据调用了内部pp_subst（）例程。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal routine that does assignment to a substr() was handed a NULL.
trans-unit.target: （P）分配给substr（）的内部例程被传递为NULL。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal routine that handles arguments to &CORE::foo() subroutine calls was unable to determine what type of arguments were expected.
trans-unit.target: （P）处理 &CORE::foo() 子例程调用的参数的内部例程无法确定期望的参数类型。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal routine used to clear a typeglob's entries tried repeatedly, but each time something re-created entries in the glob. Most likely the glob contains an object with a reference back to the glob and a destructor that adds a new object to the glob.
trans-unit.target: （P）用于清除Typeglob条目的内部例程反复尝试，但是每次在Glob中重新创建条目时都会尝试。极有可能该glob包含一个具有对该glob的引用的对象和一个将新对象添加到glob的析构函数。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal sv_replace() function was handed a new SV with a reference count other than 1.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部的sv_replace（）函数已传递给引用计数不是1的新SV。

trans-unit.source: (P) The internal sv_upgrade routine adds "members" to an SV, making it into a more specialized kind of SV. The top several SV types are so specialized, however, that they cannot be interconverted. This message indicates that such a conversion was attempted.
trans-unit.target: （P）内部sv_upgrade例程在SV上添加“成员”，使其成为一种更特殊的SV。排名前几的SV类型是如此专业，以至于它们无法相互转换。此消息表明尝试了这种转换。

trans-unit.source: (P) The interpreter's sanity check of the C function strxfrm() failed. In your current locale the returned transformation of the string "ab" is shorter than that of the string "a", which makes no sense.
trans-unit.target: （P）对C函数strxfrm（）的解释器的完整性检查失败。在您当前的语言环境中，返回的字符串“ ab”的转换比字符串“ a”的转换短，这没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: (P) The lexer got into a bad state at a case modifier.
trans-unit.target: （P）词法分析器的大小写修饰符进入错误状态。

trans-unit.source: (P) The lexer got into a bad state parsing a string with brackets.
trans-unit.target: （P）词法分析器进入解析状态，使用括号括起来的字符串处于错误状态。

trans-unit.source: (P) The lexer got into a bad state while processing a case modifier.
trans-unit.target: （P）在处理case修饰符时，词法分析器进入不良状态。

trans-unit.source: (P) The library function frexp() failed, making printf("%f") impossible.
trans-unit.target: （P）库函数frexp（）失败，使得printf（“％f”）成为不可能。

trans-unit.source: (P) The malloc package that comes with Perl had an internal failure.
trans-unit.target: （P）Perl随附的malloc程序包发生内部故障。

trans-unit.source: (P) The parser got confused when trying to parse a foreach loop.
trans-unit.target: （P）尝试解析 foreach 循环时，解析器感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: (P) The regular expression engine got confused by what the regular expression compiler gave it.
trans-unit.target: （P）正则表达式引擎对正则表达式编译器提供的内容感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: (P) The regular expression engine got passed a regexp program without a valid magic number.
trans-unit.target: （P）正则表达式引擎通过了一个没有有效幻数的regexp程序。

trans-unit.source: (P) The regular expression parser is confused.
trans-unit.target: （P）正则表达式解析器感到困惑。

trans-unit.source: (P) The savestack probably got out of sync. At least, there was an invalid enum on the top of it.
trans-unit.target: （P）保存堆栈可能不同步。至少在其顶部有一个无效的枚举。

trans-unit.source: (P) The savestack was requested to restore more localized values than there are in the savestack.
trans-unit.target: （P）已请求保存堆栈恢复比保存堆栈中更多的本地化值。

trans-unit.source: (P) The split was looping infinitely. (Obviously, a split shouldn't iterate more times than there are characters of input, which is what happened.) See split.
trans-unit.target: （P）分裂无限循环。（很明显，拆分不会迭代超过输入字符个数的次数，这就是发生的情况。）请参见split。

trans-unit.source: (P) The split was looping infinitely. (Obviously, a split shouldn't iterate more times than there are characters of input, which is what happened.) See "split" in perlfunc.
trans-unit.target: （P）分裂无限循环。（很明显，拆分不应迭代超过输入字符个数的次数，这就是发生的情况。）请参见perlfunc中的“ split”。

trans-unit.source: (P) The substitution was looping infinitely. (Obviously, a substitution shouldn't iterate more times than there are characters of input, which is what happened.) See the discussion of substitution in "Regexp Quote-Like Operators" in perlop.
trans-unit.target: （P）替换无限循环。（很明显，替换迭代的次数不应超过输入字符的次数，这是发生的情况。）请参见perlop中“ Regexp Quote-Like运算符”中有关替换的讨论。

trans-unit.source: (P) The substitution was looping infinitely. (Obviously, a substitution shouldn't iterate more times than there are characters of input, which is what happened.) See the discussion of substitution in Regexp Quote-Like Operators in perlop.
trans-unit.target: （P）替换无限循环。（很明显，替换迭代的次数不应超过输入字符的次数，这是发生的情况。）请参阅perlop中Regexp Quote-Like运算符中有关替换的讨论。

trans-unit.source: (P) The sv_chop() routine was passed a position that is not within the scalar's string buffer.
trans-unit.target: （P）sv_chop（）例程传递的位置不在标量的字符串缓冲区内。

trans-unit.source: (P) The sv_insert() routine was told to remove more string than there was string.
trans-unit.target: （P）告诉sv_insert（）例程删除比字符串多的字符串。

trans-unit.source: (P) This is counted as an internal error, because every machine should supply dbm nowadays, because Perl comes with SDBM. See SDBM_File.
trans-unit.target: （P）这被视为内部错误，因为当今每台机器都应提供dbm，因为Perl附带了SDBM。参见SDBM_File。

trans-unit.source: (P) This is either an error in Perl, or, if you're using one, your custom regular expression engine. If not the latter, report the problem through the perlbug utility.
trans-unit.target: （P）这可能是Perl中的错误，或者，如果您使用的是自定义正则表达式引擎，则可能是错误。如果不是后者，请通过perlbug实用工具报告问题。

trans-unit.source: (P) This is either an error in Perl, or, if you're using one, your custom regular expression engine. If not the latter, report the problem to https://github.com/Perl/perl5/issues.
trans-unit.target: （P）这是Perl中的错误，或者，如果使用的是自定义正则表达式引擎，则可能是错误。如果不是后者，请向https://github.com/Perl/perl5/issues报告问题。

trans-unit.source: (P) This should have been caught by safemalloc() instead.
trans-unit.target: （P）应该已经被safemalloc（）捕获了。

trans-unit.source: (P) We popped the context stack to a block context, and then discovered it wasn't a block context.
trans-unit.target: （P）我们将上下文堆栈弹出到块上下文中，然后发现它不是块上下文。

trans-unit.source: (P) We popped the context stack to a context with the specified label, and then discovered it wasn't a context we know how to do a goto in.
trans-unit.target: （P）我们将上下文堆栈弹出到具有指定标签的上下文中，然后发现它不是我们知道如何执行goto的上下文。

trans-unit.source: (P) We popped the context stack to a subroutine or eval context, and then discovered it wasn't a subroutine or eval context.
trans-unit.target: （P）我们将上下文堆栈弹出到子例程或eval上下文，然后发现它不是子例程或eval上下文。

trans-unit.source: (P) We popped the context stack to an eval context, and then discovered it wasn't an eval context.
trans-unit.target: （P）我们将上下文堆栈弹出到一个eval上下文中，然后发现它不是一个eval上下文。

trans-unit.source: (P) When compiling a subroutine call in lvalue context, Perl failed an internal consistency check. It encountered a malformed op tree.
trans-unit.target: （P）在左值上下文中编译子例程调用时，Perl在内部一致性检查中失败。它遇到了格式错误的op树。

trans-unit.source: (P) When starting a new thread or returning values from a thread, Perl encountered an invalid data type.
trans-unit.target: （P）当启动新线程或从线程返回值时，Perl遇到了无效的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: (P) While attempting folding constants an exception other than an eval failure was caught.
trans-unit.target: （P）在尝试折叠常量时，发现了除 eval 失败以外的异常。

trans-unit.source: (P) While attempting folding constants an exception other than an eval failure was caught.
trans-unit.target: （P）在尝试折叠常量时，发现了除 eval 失败以外的异常。

trans-unit.source: (P) While compiling a pattern that has embedded (?{}) or (??{}) code blocks, perl couldn't locate the code block that should have already been seen and compiled by perl before control passed to the regex compiler.
trans-unit.target: （P）在编译嵌入了（？{}）或（?? {}）代码块的模式时，perl找不到在控制权传递给regex编译器之前perl应该已经看到并编译的代码块。

trans-unit.source: (P) You somehow managed to call tie on an array that does not keep a reference count on its arguments and cannot be made to do so. Such arrays are not even supposed to be accessible to Perl code, but are only used internally.
trans-unit.target: （P）您以某种方式设法在未在其参数上保留引用计数且无法这样做的数组上调用 tie 。这样的数组甚至不应该被Perl代码访问，而仅在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) -s by name on an open file will return the space reserved on disk, rather than the current extent. -s on an open filehandle returns the current size.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）-在打开文件中按名称显示的 -s 将返回磁盘上保留的空间，而不是当前盘区。打开文件句柄上的 -s 返回当前大小。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) -x (or -X) determine if a file has an executable file type.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS） -x （或 -X ）确定文件是否具有可执行文件类型。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) mtime, atime and ctime all return the last modification time. dev and ino are not necessarily reliable.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS） mtime ， atime 和 ctime 都返回上次修改时间。 dev 和 ino 不一定可靠。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Available only for socket handles.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）仅适用于插槽手柄。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Meaningless.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）毫无意义。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Not implemented, hence not useful for taint checking.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）未实现，因此对于污点检查没有用。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: （RISC操作系统）未实现。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Not useful.
trans-unit.target: （RISC操作系统）无用。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Only good for changing "owner" and "other" read-write access.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）仅适用于更改“所有者”和“其他”读写访问权限。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Only reliable on sockets.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）仅在套接字上可靠。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) Open modes |- and -| are unsupported.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）打开模式 |- 和 -| 不被支持。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS) There is no shell to process metacharacters, and the native standard is to pass a command line terminated by "\n" "\r" or "\0" to the spawned program. Redirection such as > foo is performed (if at all) by the run time library of the spawned program. system LIST will call the Unix emulation library's exec emulation, which attempts to provide emulation of the stdin, stdout, stderr in force in the parent, provided the child program uses a compatible version of the emulation library. system SCALAR will call the native command line directly and no such emulation of a child Unix program will occur. Mileage will vary.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS）没有外壳程序可以处理元字符，本机标准是将以“ \ n”，“ \ r”或“ \ 0”终止的命令行传递给生成的程序。诸如 > foo 重定向由生成的程序的运行时库执行（如果有的话）。 system LIST 将调用Unix仿真库的 exec 仿真，如果子程序使用兼容版本的仿真库，它将尝试在父级中提供对stdin，stdout，stderr有效的仿真。 system SCALAR 将直接调用本机命令行，并且不会发生对子Unix程序的此类仿真。里程会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: (RISC OS, VOS) Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: （RISC OS，VOS）未实现。

trans-unit.source: (S ambiguous) You said something that may not be interpreted the way you thought. Normally it's pretty easy to disambiguate it by supplying a missing quote, operator, parenthesis pair or declaration.
trans-unit.target: （模棱两可）您说的话可能无法以您的想法来解释。通常，通过提供缺少的引号，运算符，括号对或声明来消除歧义是很容易的。

trans-unit.source: (S ambiguous) You used a variable or subroutine call where the parser was expecting an operator. The parser has assumed you really meant to use an operator, but this is highly likely to be incorrect. For example, if you say "*foo *foo" it will be interpreted as if you said "*foo * 'foo'".
trans-unit.target: （模棱两可）您在解析器期望运算符的地方使用了变量或子例程调用。解析器已经假定您确实打算使用运算符，但这很可能是不正确的。例如，如果您说“ * foo * foo”，它将被解释为就像您说“ * foo *'foo'”一样。

trans-unit.source: (S ambiguous) You wrote a unary operator followed by something that looks like a binary operator that could also have been interpreted as a term or unary operator. For instance, if you know that the rand function has a default argument of 1.0, and you write
trans-unit.target: （模棱两可）您编写了一个一元运算符，后跟一个看起来像二元运算符的东西，也可以将其解释为术语或一元运算符。例如，如果您知道rand函数的默认参数为1.0，则可以编写

trans-unit.source: (S ambiguous) You wrote something like -foo , which might be the string "-foo" , or a call to the function foo , negated. If you meant the string, just write "-foo" . If you meant the function call, write -foo() .
trans-unit.target: （S模棱两可）您编写了 -foo 之类的东西，它可能是字符串 "-foo" 或对函数 foo 的调用被否定了。如果您要输入字符串，则只需输入 "-foo" 。如果要调用函数，请编写 -foo() 。

trans-unit.source: (S ambiguous) You wrote something like -foo, which might be the string "-foo", or a call to the function foo, negated. If you meant the string, just write "-foo". If you meant the function call, write -foo().
trans-unit.target: （S模棱两可）您编写了 -foo 之类的东西，它可能是字符串 "-foo" 或对函数 foo 的调用被否定了。如果您要输入字符串，则只需输入 "-foo" 。如果要调用函数，请编写 -foo() 。

trans-unit.source: (S debugging) An array was assigned to when it was being freed. Freed values are not supposed to be visible to Perl code. This can also happen if XS code calls av_clear from a custom magic callback on the array.
trans-unit.target: （S调试）在释放数组时将其分配给它。释放的值不应在Perl代码中可见。如果XS代码从阵列上的自定义魔术回调中调用 av_clear ，也会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: (S debugging) Mortalized values are supposed to be freed by the free_tmps() routine. This indicates that something else is freeing the SV before the free_tmps() routine gets a chance, which means that the free_tmps() routine will be freeing an unreferenced scalar when it does try to free it.
trans-unit.target: （S调试）应该通过free_tmps（）例程释放异常值。这表示在free_tmps（）例程获得机会之前，还有其他东西正在释放SV，这意味着free_tmps（）例程在尝试释放未引用的标量时将释放它。

trans-unit.source: (S debugging) Perl was called with invalid debugger flags. Call perl with the -D option with no flags to see the list of acceptable values. See also "-Dletters" in perlrun.
trans-unit.target: （S调试）使用无效的调试器标志调用Perl。使用不带标志的-D选项调用perl以查看可接受值的列表。另请参见perlrun中的“ -Dletters”。

trans-unit.source: (S debugging) This indicates that something went wrong and Perl got

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::bitwise) This warning is emitted if you use bitwise operators (& | ^ ~ &. |. ^. ~. ) with the "bitwise" feature enabled. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：:按位）如果使用启用了“按位”功能的按位运算符（ & | ^ ~ &. |. ^. ~. ），则会发出此警告。如果要使用该功能，只需取消警告，但要知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::const_attr) The "const" attribute is experimental. If you want to use the feature, disable the warning with no warnings 'experimental::const_attr' , but know that in doing so you are taking the risk that your code may break in a future Perl version.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: const_attr）“ const”属性是实验性的。如果要使用该功能，请禁用 no warnings 'experimental::const_attr' ，但是要知道这样做会冒着在将来的Perl版本中破坏代码的风险。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::const_attr) The "const" attribute is experimental. If you want to use the feature, disable the warning with no warnings 'experimental::const_attr', but know that in doing so you are taking the risk that your code may break in a future Perl version.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: const_attr）“ const”属性是实验性的。如果要使用该功能，请禁用 no warnings 'experimental::const_attr' ，但是要知道，这样做会冒可能在将来的Perl版本中破坏代码的风险。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::declared_refs) This warning is emitted if you use a reference constructor on the right-hand side of my, state, our, or local. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: declared_refs）如果在 my ， state ， our 或 local 的右侧使用引用构造函数，则发出此警告。如果您想使用该功能，只需取消警告即可，但您知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能在将来的Perl版本中可能会更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::isa) This warning is emitted if you use the (isa) operator. This operator is currently experimental and its behaviour may change in future releases of Perl.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: isa）如果使用（ isa ）运算符，则发出此警告。该运算符目前处于实验阶段，其行为可能会在Perl的将来版本中改变。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::lexical_subs) This warning is emitted if you declare a sub with my or state. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性:: lexical_subs）如果用 my 或 state 声明一个子，则发出此警告。如果要使用该功能，只需取消警告，但要知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::lexical_topic) Lexical $_ is an experimental feature and its behavior may change or even be removed in any future release of perl. See the explanation under $_ in perlvar.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性:: lexical_topic）词法$ _是一项实验性功能，其行为可能会在将来的perl版本中更改甚至删除。请参阅perlvar中$ _下的说明。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::postderef) This warning is emitted if you use the experimental postfix dereference syntax. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性:: postderef）如果使用实验性后缀取消引用语法，则发出此警告。如果要使用该功能，只需取消警告，但要知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::private_use) This feature is actually a hook for future use.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：： private_use）此功能实际上是将来使用的钩子。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::re_strict) The things that are different when a regular expression pattern is compiled under 'strict' are subject to change in future Perl releases in incompatible ways. This means that a pattern that compiles today may not in a future Perl release. This warning is to alert you to that risk.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: re_strict）在 'strict' 下编译正则表达式模式时，不同之处可能在将来的Perl版本中以不兼容的方式进行更改。这意味着今天编译的模式可能不会在将来的Perl版本中。此警告旨在提醒您该风险。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::refaliasing) This warning is emitted if you use a reference constructor on the left-hand side of an assignment to alias one variable to another. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: refaliasing）如果在赋值的左侧使用引用构造函数将一个变量别名为另一个变量，则发出此警告。如果要使用该功能，只需取消警告，但要知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::regex_sets) This warning is emitted if you use the syntax (?[ ]) in a regular expression. The details of this feature are subject to change. if you want to use it, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change in a future Perl version, you can do this to silence the warning:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: regex_sets）如果在正则表达式中使用语法 (?[ ]) ，则发出此警告。此功能的详细信息可能会更改。如果您想使用它，但又知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，而该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中进行更改，则可以这样做来使警告消失：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::regex_sets) This warning is emitted if you use the syntax (?[ ]) in a regular expression. The details of this feature are subject to change. If you want to use it, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change in a future Perl version, you can do this to silence the warning:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: regex_sets）如果在正则表达式中使用语法 (?[ ]) ，则发出此警告。此功能的详细信息可能会更改。如果您想使用它，但又知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，而该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中进行更改，那么您可以这样做以使警告消失：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::signatures) This warning is emitted if you unwrap a subroutine's arguments using a signature. Simply suppress the warning if you want to use the feature, but know that in doing so you are taking the risk of using an experimental feature which may change or be removed in a future Perl version:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：：签名）如果使用签名解包子例程的参数，则发出此警告。如果要使用该功能，只需取消警告，但要知道这样做会冒着使用实验性功能的风险，该功能可能会在将来的Perl版本中更改或删除：

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) given depends on smartmatch, which is experimental, so its behavior may change or even be removed in any future release of perl. See the explanation under "Experimental Details on given and when" in perlsyn.
trans-unit.target: given （Sexperiment :: smartmatch）取决于smartmatch，后者是实验性的，因此其行为可能会更改，甚至在以后的任何perl版本中都将被删除。请参阅perlsyn中“给定和何时的实验细节”下的解释。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) given depends on smartmatch, which is experimental, so its behavior may change or even be removed in any future release of perl. See the explanation under Experimental Details on given and when in perlsyn.
trans-unit.target: given （Sexperiment :: smartmatch）取决于smartmatch，后者是实验性的，因此其行为可能会更改，甚至在以后的任何perl版本中都可能删除。在perlsyn中，有关给定值和时间的信息，请参见“ 实验详细信息”下的说明。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) when depends on smartmatch, which is experimental. Additionally, it has several special cases that may not be immediately obvious, and their behavior may change or even be removed in any future release of perl. See the explanation under "Experimental Details on given and when" in perlsyn.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性:: smartmatch） when 取决于智能匹配，这是实验性的。此外，它还具有一些可能不会立即显而易见的特殊情况，并且它们的行为可能会更改，甚至在以后的任何perl版本中都将被删除。请参阅perlsyn中“给定和何时的实验细节”下的解释。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) when depends on smartmatch, which is experimental. Additionally, it has several special cases that may not be immediately obvious, and their behavior may change or even be removed in any future release of perl. See the explanation under Experimental Details on given and when in perlsyn.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性:: smartmatch） when 取决于智能匹配，这是实验性的。此外，它还具有一些可能不会立即显而易见的特殊情况，并且它们的行为可能会更改，甚至在以后的任何perl版本中都会删除。在perlsyn中，有关给定值和时间的信息，请参见“ 实验详细信息”下的说明。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) This warning is emitted if you use the smartmatch (~~ ) operator. This is currently an experimental feature, and its details are subject to change in future releases of Perl. Particularly, its current behavior is noticed for being unnecessarily complex and unintuitive, and is very likely to be overhauled.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: smartmatch）如果使用smartmatch（ ~~ ）运算符，则发出此警告。目前，这是一项实验性功能，其详细信息可能会在Perl的将来版本中更改。特别是，它的当前行为被认为是不必要的复杂和不直观的，并且很可能会被彻底检查。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::smartmatch) This warning is emitted if you use the smartmatch (~~) operator. This is currently an experimental feature, and its details are subject to change in future releases of Perl. Particularly, its current behavior is noticed for being unnecessarily complex and unintuitive, and is very likely to be overhauled.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: smartmatch）如果使用smartmatch（ ~~ ）运算符，则发出此警告。目前，这是一项实验性功能，其详细信息可能会在Perl的将来版本中更改。特别是，它的当前行为被认为是不必要的复杂和不直观的，并且很可能会被彻底检查。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::uniprop_wildcards) This feature is experimental and its behavior may in any future release of perl. See "Wildcards in Property Values" in perlunicode.
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: uniprop_wildcards）此功能是实验性的，其行为可能会在将来的perl版本中出现。请参见perlunicode中的“属性值中的通配符”。

trans-unit.source: (S experimental::win32_perlio) The :win32 PerlIO layer is experimental. If you want to take the risk of using this layer, simply disable this warning:
trans-unit.target: （S实验性：: win32_perlio） :win32 PerlIO层是实验性的。如果您想冒险使用此层，只需禁用以下警告：

trans-unit.source: (S glob) Something went wrong with the external program(s) used for glob and <*.c> . Usually, this means that you supplied a glob pattern that caused the external program to fail and exit with a nonzero status. If the message indicates that the abnormal exit resulted in a coredump, this may also mean that your csh (C shell) is broken. If so, you should change all of the csh-related variables in config.sh: If you have tcsh, make the variables refer to it as if it were csh (e.g. full_csh='/usr/bin/tcsh' ); otherwise, make them all empty (except that d_csh should be 'undef' ) so that Perl will think csh is missing. In either case, after editing config.sh, run ./Configure -S and rebuild Perl.
trans-unit.target: （S glob）用于 glob 和 <*.c> 的外部程序出了点问题。通常，这意味着您提供了一个 glob 模式，该模式导致外部程序失败并以非零状态退出。如果该消息表明异常退出导致了核心转储，则也可能意味着您的csh（C Shell）已损坏。如果是这样，则应在config.sh中更改所有与csh相关的变量：如果具有tcsh，则使该变量像csh一样引用它（例如， full_csh='/usr/bin/tcsh' ）；否则，将它们全部清空（除非 d_csh 应该为 'undef' ），以使Perl认为缺少csh。无论哪种情况，在编辑config.sh之后，运行 ./Configure -S 并重建Perl。

trans-unit.source: (S glob) Something went wrong with the external program(s) used for glob and <*.c>. Usually, this means that you supplied a glob pattern that caused the external program to fail and exit with a nonzero status. If the message indicates that the abnormal exit resulted in a coredump, this may also mean that your csh (C shell) is broken. If so, you should change all of the csh-related variables in config.sh: If you have tcsh, make the variables refer to it as if it were csh (e.g. full_csh='/usr/bin/tcsh'); otherwise, make them all empty (except that d_csh should be 'undef') so that Perl will think csh is missing. In either case, after editing config.sh, run ./Configure -S and rebuild Perl.
trans-unit.target: （S glob）用于 glob 和 <*.c> 的外部程序出了点问题。通常，这意味着您提供了一个 glob 模式，该模式导致外部程序失败并以非零状态退出。如果该消息表明异常退出导致coredump，则这也可能意味着您的csh（C Shell）已损坏。如果是这样，则应在config.sh中更改所有与csh相关的变量：如果具有tcsh，则使该变量像csh一样引用它（例如， full_csh='/usr/bin/tcsh' ）；否则，将它们全部清空（除非 d_csh 应该为 'undef' ），以使Perl认为缺少csh。无论哪种情况，在编辑config.sh之后，运行 ./Configure -S 并重建Perl。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) The -i option was passed on the command line, indicating that the script is intended to edit files in place, but no files were given. This is usually a mistake, since editing STDIN in place doesn't make sense, and can be confusing because it can make perl look like it is hanging when it is really just trying to read from STDIN. You should either pass a filename to edit, or remove -i from the command line. See perlrun for more details.
trans-unit.target: （S到位） -i 选项在命令行中传递，表明该脚本旨在编辑到位的文件，但未提供文件。这通常是一个错误，因为在原地编辑STDIN毫无意义，并且会造成混淆，因为当它实际上只是尝试从STDIN读取时，它会使perl看起来好像挂了一样。您应该传递文件名进行编辑，或者从命令行中删除 -i 。有关更多详细信息，请参见perlrun。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) The -i option was passed on the command line, indicating that the script is intended to edit files in place, but no files were given. This is usually a mistake, since editing STDIN in place doesn't make sense, and can be confusing because it can make perl look like it is hanging when it is really just trying to read from STDIN. You should either pass a filename to edit, or remove -i from the command line. See perlrun for more details.
trans-unit.target: （S到位） -i 选项在命令行中传递，表示该脚本旨在编辑到位的文件，但未提供文件。这通常是一个错误，因为就地编辑STDIN毫无意义，并且会造成混乱，因为当它实际上只是尝试从STDIN读取时，它会使perl看起来好像挂了一样。您应该传递文件名进行编辑，或者从命令行中删除 -i 。有关更多详细信息，请参见perlrun。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) The creation of the new file failed for the indicated reason.
trans-unit.target: （S到位）由于指示的原因，新文件的创建失败。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) The implicit opening of a file through use of the <> filehandle, either implicitly under the -n or -p command-line switches, or explicitly, failed for the indicated reason. Usually this is because you don't have read permission for a file which you named on the command line.
trans-unit.target: （S到位）通过使用 <> 文件句柄隐式打开文件（在 -n 或 -p 命令行开关下隐式打开，或由于指定的原因而显式失败）。通常是因为您没有在命令行上命名的文件的读取权限。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) The rename done by the -i switch failed for some reason, probably because you don't have write permission to the directory.
trans-unit.target: （S到位）-i开关完成的重命名由于某种原因而失败，可能是因为您没有对该目录的写许可权。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) You requested an inplace edit without creating a backup file. Perl was unable to remove the original file to replace it with the modified file. The file was left unmodified.
trans-unit.target: （原位显示S）您请求进行原位编辑而不创建备份文件。Perl无法删除原始文件以将其替换为修改后的文件。该文件未修改。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) You tried to use the -i switch on a special file, such as a file in /dev, a FIFO or an uneditable directory. The file was ignored.
trans-unit.target: （用S代替）您尝试在特殊文件（例如/ dev中的文件，FIFO或不可编辑的目录）上使用-i开关。该文件被忽略。

trans-unit.source: (S inplace) Your filesystem does not support filenames longer than 14 characters and Perl was unable to create a unique filename during inplace editing with the -i switch. The file was ignored.
trans-unit.target: （S inplace）您的文件系统不支持超过14个字符的文件名，并且在使用-i开关进行就地编辑期间，Perl无法创建唯一的文件名。该文件被忽略。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) A routine asked for a symbol from a symbol table that ought to have existed already, but for some reason it didn't, and had to be created on an emergency basis to prevent a core dump.
trans-unit.target: （内部）例程从符号表中请求符号，该符号应该已经存在，但由于某种原因它不存在，因此必须在紧急情况下创建该例程以防止核心转储。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) All SV objects are supposed to be allocated from arenas that will be garbage collected on exit. An SV was discovered to be outside any of those arenas.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）所有SV对象都应该从竞技场分配，这些竞技场将在退出时进行垃圾回收。发现SV位于任何这些领域之外。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) An internal warning that the grammar is screwed up.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）内部警告，提示语法已错误。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) On exit, Perl found some strings remaining in the shared string table used for copy on write and for hash keys. The entries should have been freed, so this indicates a bug somewhere.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）在退出时，Perl在共享字符串表中发现了一些剩余的字符串，这些字符串用于写时复制和哈希键。条目应已释放，因此这表明某个地方有错误。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) Perl maintains a reference-counted internal table of strings to optimize the storage and access of hash keys and other strings. This indicates someone tried to decrement the reference count of a string that can no longer be found in the table.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）Perl维护一个引用计数的字符串内部表，以优化哈希键和其他字符串的存储和访问。这表明有人试图减少在表中找不到的字符串的引用计数。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) Perl went to decrement the reference count of a scalar to see if it would go to 0, and discovered that it had already gone to 0 earlier, and should have been freed, and in fact, probably was freed. This could indicate that SvREFCNT_dec() was called too many times, or that SvREFCNT_inc() was called too few times, or that the SV was mortalized when it shouldn't have been, or that memory has been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）Perl减少了标量的引用计数，看它是否会变为0，并发现它早些时候已经变为0，应该已经释放了，实际上可能已经释放了。这可能表明SvREFCNT_dec（）被调用了太多次，或者SvREFCNT_inc（）被调用了太多次，或者该SV在不应该被调用时被破坏，或者该内存已损坏。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) Perl's internal routine that handles printf and sprintf formatting follows a slightly different set of rules when called from C or XS code. Specifically, formats consisting of digits followed by "p" (e.g., "%7p") are reserved for future use. If you see this message, then an XS module tried to call that routine with one such reserved format.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）从C或XS代码调用时，处理 printf 和 sprintf 格式的Perl内部例程遵循一组略有不同的规则。具体来说，保留由数字后跟“ p”（例如“％7p”）组成的格式，以备将来使用。如果看到此消息，则XS模块尝试使用一种这样的保留格式调用该例程。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) Perl's internal routine that handles printf and sprintf formatting follows a slightly different set of rules when called from C or XS code. Specifically, formats consisting of digits followed by "p" (e.g., "%7p") are reserved for future use. If you see this message, then an XS module tried to call that routine with one such reserved format.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）从C或XS代码调用时，处理 printf 和 sprintf 格式的Perl内部例程遵循一组略有不同的规则。具体来说，保留由数字后跟“ p”（例如“％7p”）组成的格式，以备将来使用。如果看到此消息，则XS模块尝试使用一种这样的保留格式调用该例程。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) Something went wrong in Perl's internal bookkeeping of scalars: not all scalar variables were deallocated by the time Perl exited. What this usually indicates is a memory leak, which is of course bad, especially if the Perl program is intended to be long-running.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）Perl内部的标量记帐出错了：在Perl退出时，并不是所有的标量变量都被释放了。这通常表示存在内存泄漏，这当然是不好的，尤其是在Perl程序要长时间运行的情况下。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The behavior of each() after insertion is undefined; it may skip items, or visit items more than once. Consider using keys() instead of each().
trans-unit.target: （S内部）插入后 each() ）的行为未定义；它可能会跳过项目，或多次访问项目。考虑使用 keys() 而不是 each() 。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The behavior of each() after insertion is undefined; it may skip items, or visit items more than once. Consider using keys() instead of each().
trans-unit.target: （S内部）插入后 each() ）的行为是不确定的；它可能会跳过项目，或多次访问项目。考虑使用 keys() 而不是 each() 。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The exit code detected an internal inconsistency in how many blocks were entered and left.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）退出代码检测到内部不一致，输入和离开了多少个块。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The exit code detected an internal inconsistency in how many execution contexts were entered and left.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）退出代码检测到输入和离开了多少个执行上下文的内部不一致。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The exit code detected an internal inconsistency in how many mortal scalars were allocated and freed.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）退出代码检测到内部的不一致之处，即分配和释放了多少个普通标量。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The exit code detected an internal inconsistency in how many values were temporarily localized.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）退出代码检测到内部临时存在多少个值不一致。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The internal newSVsv() routine was called to duplicate a scalar that had previously been marked as free.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）调用内部newSVsv（）例程来复制以前已标记为空闲的标量。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The reference counts got screwed up on symbol aliases.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）引用计数在符号别名上弄乱了。

trans-unit.source: (S internal) The symbol in question was declared but somehow went out of scope before it could possibly have been used.
trans-unit.target: （S内部）声明了所涉及的符号，但是在某种程度上可能已被使用之前超出了范围。

trans-unit.source: (S io) An error occurred when Perl implicitly closed a filehandle. This usually indicates your file system ran out of disk space.
trans-unit.target: （S io）Perl隐式关闭文件句柄时发生错误。这通常表示文件系统磁盘空间不足。

trans-unit.source: (S io) There were errors during the implicit close() done on a filehandle when its reference count reached zero while it was still open, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: （S io）在文件句柄的隐式close（）期间，当它的引用计数仍为打开状态时达到零时，会出错，例如：

trans-unit.source: (S io) You tried to apply an encoding that did not exist to a filehandle, either with open() or binmode().
trans-unit.target: （S io）您尝试使用open（）或binmode（）将不存在的编码应用于文件句柄。

trans-unit.source: (S malloc) An internal routine called free() on something that had already been freed.
trans-unit.target: （S malloc）一个内部例程，它对已经被释放的对象调用free（）。

trans-unit.source: (S malloc) An internal routine called free() on something that had never been malloc()ed in the first place. Mandatory, but can be disabled by setting environment variable PERL_BADFREE to 0.
trans-unit.target: （S malloc）一个内部程序，称为free（），它最初从未进行过malloc（）处理。强制性的，但是可以通过将环境变量 PERL_BADFREE 设置为0 来禁用。

trans-unit.source: (S malloc) An internal routine called realloc() on something that had already been freed.
trans-unit.target: （S malloc）在已经释放的内容上的内部例程，称为realloc（）。

trans-unit.source: (S malloc) An internal routine called realloc() on something that had never been malloc()ed in the first place. Mandatory, but can be disabled by setting the environment variable PERL_BADFREE to 1.
trans-unit.target: （S malloc）一个内部例程，称为realloc（），该例程最初从未进行过malloc（）处理。强制性的，但是可以通过将环境变量 PERL_BADFREE 设置为1 来禁用。

trans-unit.source: (S misc) Certain operations make no sense with negative arguments. Warning is given and the operation is not done.
trans-unit.target: （S杂项）对于否定参数，某些操作没有任何意义。发出警告，但操作未完成。

trans-unit.source: (S misc) With "use strict" in effect, you referred to a global variable that you apparently thought was imported from another module, because something else of the same name (usually a subroutine) is exported by that module. It usually means you put the wrong funny character on the front of your variable.
trans-unit.target: （S misc）启用“严格使用”后，您引用了一个您显然认为是从另一个模块导入的全局变量，因为该模块导出了其他同名的东西（通常是子例程）。这通常意味着您将错误的有趣字符放在变量的前面。

trans-unit.source: (S non_unicode portable) You had a code point that has never been in any standard, so it is likely that languages other than Perl will NOT understand it. This code point also will not fit in a 32-bit word on ASCII platforms and therefore is non-portable between systems.
trans-unit.target: （S non_unicode可移植的）您的代码点从未达到任何标准，因此Perl以外的语言很可能无法理解。此代码点在ASCII平台上也不适合32位字，因此在系统之间不可移植。

trans-unit.source: (S non_unicode) Perl allows strings to contain a superset of Unicode code points; each code point may be as large as what is storable in a signed integer on your system, but these may not be accepted by other languages/systems. This message occurs when you matched a string containing such a code point against a regular expression pattern, and the code point was matched against a Unicode property, \p{...} or \P{...}. Unicode properties are only defined on Unicode code points, so the result of this match is undefined by Unicode, but Perl (starting in v5.20) treats non-Unicode code points as if they were typical unassigned Unicode ones, and matched this one accordingly. Whether a given property matches these code points or not is specified in "Properties accessible through \p{} and \P{}" in perluniprops.
trans-unit.target: （S non_unicode）Perl允许字符串包含Unicode代码点的超集；每个代码点都可能与系统上带符号整数可存储的代码点一样大，但是其他语言/系统可能不会接受这些代码点。当您将包含此类代码点的字符串与正则表达式模式匹配，并且代码点与Unicode属性 \p{...} 或 \P{...} 匹配时，会出现此消息。 Unicode属性仅在Unicode代码点上定义，因此Unicode不会定义此匹配的结果，但是Perl（从v5.20开始）将非Unicode代码点视为典型的未分配的Unicode代码点，并对此进行了相应的匹配。指定的属性是否与这些代码点匹配perluniprops中的“可通过\ p {}和\ P {}访问的属性”。

trans-unit.source: (S non_unicode) Perl allows strings to contain a superset of Unicode code points; each code point may be as large as what is storable in an unsigned integer on your system, but these may not be accepted by other languages/systems. This message occurs when you matched a string containing such a code point against a regular expression pattern, and the code point was matched against a Unicode property, \p{...} or \P{...} . Unicode properties are only defined on Unicode code points, so the result of this match is undefined by Unicode, but Perl (starting in v5.20) treats non-Unicode code points as if they were typical unassigned Unicode ones, and matched this one accordingly. Whether a given property matches these code points or not is specified in Properties accessible through \p{} and \P{} in perluniprops.
trans-unit.target: （S non_unicode）Perl允许字符串包含Unicode代码点的超集；每个代码点可能与系统上无符号整数可存储的代码点一样大，但是其他语言/系统可能不接受这些代码点。当您将包含此类代码点的字符串与正则表达式模式匹配，并且代码点与Unicode属性 \p{...} 或 \P{...} 匹配时，会出现此消息。 Unicode属性仅在Unicode代码点上定义，因此Unicode不会定义此匹配的结果，但是Perl（从v5.20开始）将非Unicode代码点视为典型的未分配Unicode代码点，并对此进行了匹配。指定的属性是否与这些代码点匹配可通过perluniprops中的\ p {}和\ P {}访问的属性。

trans-unit.source: (S non_unicode) You had a code point above the Unicode maximum of U+10FFFF.
trans-unit.target: （S non_unicode）您的代码点高于Unicode最大U + 10FFFF。

trans-unit.source: (S non_unicode) You performed an operation requiring Unicode rules on a code point that is not in Unicode, so what it should do is not defined. Perl has chosen to have it do nothing, and warn you.
trans-unit.target: （S non_unicode）您对非Unicode的代码点执行了要求Unicode规则的操作，因此未定义应执行的操作。Perl选择不执行任何操作，并警告您。

trans-unit.source: (S nonchar) Certain codepoints, such as U+FFFE and U+FFFF, are defined by the Unicode standard to be non-characters. Those are legal codepoints, but are reserved for internal use; so, applications shouldn't attempt to exchange them. An application may not be expecting any of these characters at all, and receiving them may lead to bugs. If you know what you are doing you can turn off this warning by no warnings 'nonchar'; .
trans-unit.target: （S非字符）某些代码点（例如U + FFFE和U + FFFF）由Unicode标准定义为非字符。这些是合法的代码点，但保留供内部使用。因此，应用程序不应尝试交换它们。应用程序可能根本不需要这些字符，而接收它们可能会导致错误。如果您知道自己在做什么，则可以通过 no warnings 'nonchar'; 警告来关闭此警告。。

trans-unit.source: (S nonchar) Certain codepoints, such as U+FFFE and U+FFFF, are defined by the Unicode standard to be non-characters. Those are legal codepoints, but are reserved for internal use; so, applications shouldn't attempt to exchange them. An application may not be expecting any of these characters at all, and receiving them may lead to bugs. If you know what you are doing you can turn off this warning by no warnings 'nonchar';.
trans-unit.target: （S非字符）某些代码点（例如U + FFFE和U + FFFF）由Unicode标准定义为非字符。这些是合法的代码点，但保留供内部使用。因此，应用程序不应尝试交换它们。应用程序可能根本不希望这些字符中的任何一个，接收它们可能会导致错误。如果您知道自己在做什么，则可以通过 no warnings 'nonchar'; 警告来关闭此警告。。

trans-unit.source: (S overflow) The hexadecimal, octal or binary number you have specified either as a literal or as an argument to hex() or oct() is too big for your architecture, and has been converted to a floating point number. On a 32-bit architecture the largest hexadecimal, octal or binary number representable without overflow is 0xFFFFFFFF, 037777777777, or 0b11111111111111111111111111111111 respectively. Note that Perl transparently promotes all numbers to a floating point representation internally--subject to loss of precision errors in subsequent operations.
trans-unit.target: （S溢出）您指定为文字或作为hex（）或oct（）的参数指定的十六进制，八进制或二进制数对于您的体系结构而言太大，并且已转换为浮点数。在32位体系结构上，可表示且无溢出的最大十六进制，八进制或二进制数分别为0xFFFFFFFF，037777777777或0b11111111111111111111111111111111。请注意，Perl在内部透明地将所有数字提升为浮点表示形式-可能会在后续操作中损失精度错误。

trans-unit.source: (S overflow) The number you have passed to srand is too big to fit in your architecture's integer representation. The number has been replaced with the largest integer supported (0xFFFFFFFF on 32-bit architectures). This means you may be getting less randomness than you expect, because different random seeds above the maximum will return the same sequence of random numbers.
trans-unit.target: （S溢出）您传递给rand的数字太大，无法容纳在体系结构的整数表示中。该数字已替换为支持的最大整数（在32位体系结构上为0xFFFFFFFF）。这意味着您获得的随机性可能比预期的要少，因为高于最大值的不同随机种子将返回相同的随机数序列。

trans-unit.source: (S precedence) The old irregular construct
trans-unit.target: （S优先）旧的不规则构造

trans-unit.source: (S printf) The %vd (s)printf format does not support version objects with alpha parts.
trans-unit.target: （S printf）％vd（s）printf格式不支持带有Alpha部分的版本对象。

trans-unit.source: (S prototype) The subroutine being declared or defined had previously been declared or defined with a different function prototype.
trans-unit.target: （S原型）之前已使用不同的函数原型声明或定义了要声明或定义的子例程。

trans-unit.source: (S regexp) You used a regular expression with case-insensitive matching, and there is a bug in Perl in which the built-in regular expression folding rules are not accurate. This may lead to incorrect results. Please report this as a bug to https://github.com/Perl/perl5/issues.
trans-unit.target: （S regexp）您使用了不区分大小写匹配的正则表达式，并且Perl中存在一个错误，其中内置的正则表达式折叠规则不正确。这可能会导致错误的结果。请将此错误报告给https://github.com/Perl/perl5/issues。

trans-unit.source: (S regexp) You used a regular expression with case-insensitive matching, and there is a bug in Perl in which the built-in regular expression folding rules are not accurate. This may lead to incorrect results. Please report this as a bug using the perlbug utility.
trans-unit.target: （S regexp）您使用了不区分大小写匹配的正则表达式，并且Perl中存在一个错误，即内置正则表达式折叠规则不正确。这可能会导致错误的结果。请使用perlbug实用程序将此报告为错误。

trans-unit.source: (S surrogate) You had a UTF-16 surrogate in a context where they are not considered acceptable. These code points, between U+D800 and U+DFFF (inclusive), are used by Unicode only for UTF-16. However, Perl internally allows all unsigned integer code points (up to the size limit available on your platform), including surrogates. But these can cause problems when being input or output, which is likely where this message came from. If you really really know what you are doing you can turn off this warning by no warnings 'surrogate'; .
trans-unit.target: （代理）您在不可接受的情况下使用了UTF-16代理。这些代码点在U + D800和U + DFFF（包括U + DFF）之间，仅Unicode用于UTF-16。但是，Perl内部允许所有无符号的整数代码点（最大为平台上可用的大小限制），包括代理。但是这些会在输入或输出时引起问题，这很可能是此消息的来源。如果您真的真的知道自己在做什么，则可以通过 no warnings 'surrogate'; 来关闭此警告。。

trans-unit.source: (S surrogate) You had a UTF-16 surrogate in a context where they are not considered acceptable. These code points, between U+D800 and U+DFFF (inclusive), are used by Unicode only for UTF-16. However, Perl internally allows all unsigned integer code points (up to the size limit available on your platform), including surrogates. But these can cause problems when being input or output, which is likely where this message came from. If you really really know what you are doing you can turn off this warning by no warnings 'surrogate';.
trans-unit.target: （代理）您在不可接受的情况下使用了UTF-16代理。这些代码点在U + D800和U + DFFF（包括U + DFF）之间，仅Unicode用于UTF-16。但是，Perl内部允许所有无符号的整数代码点（最大到平台上可用的大小限制），包括代理。但是这些可能会在输入或输出时引起问题，这很可能是此消息的来源。如果您真的很了解自己在做什么，则可以通过 no warnings 'surrogate'; 来关闭此警告。。

trans-unit.source: (S surrogate) You performed an operation requiring Unicode rules on a Unicode surrogate. Unicode frowns upon the use of surrogates for anything but storing strings in UTF-16, but rules are (reluctantly) defined for the surrogates, and they are to do nothing for this operation. Because the use of surrogates can be dangerous, Perl warns.
trans-unit.target: （S代理）您执行了需要对Unicode代理执行Unicode规则的操作。除了将字符串存储在UTF-16中之外，Unicode都不赞成使用替代项，但是为替代项定义了（勉强地）定义了规则，并且该操作不执行任何操作。Perl警告，因为使用代理人可能很危险。

trans-unit.source: (S syntax) The Perl lexer knows whether to expect a term or an operator. If it sees what it knows to be a term when it was expecting to see an operator, it gives you this warning. Usually it indicates that an operator or delimiter was omitted, such as a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: （S语法）Perl词法分析器知道是期望术语还是运算符。如果在希望看到运算符时看到了它所知道的术语，则会向您发出此警告。通常，它表示省略了运算符或分隔符，例如分号。

trans-unit.source: (S syntax) There is no keyword "elseif" in Perl because Larry thinks it's ugly. Your code will be interpreted as an attempt to call a method named "elseif" for the class returned by the following block. This is unlikely to be what you want.
trans-unit.target: （S语法）Perl中没有关键字“ elseif”，因为Larry认为它很丑陋。您的代码将被解释为试图为下一个块返回的类调用名为“ elseif”的方法。这不太可能是您想要的。

trans-unit.source: (S syntax) This is an educated guess made in conjunction with the message "%s found where operator expected". Don't automatically put a semicolon on the previous line just because you saw this message.
trans-unit.target: （S语法）这是与消息“在操作员期望的位置找到％s”一起进行的有根据的猜测。不要仅仅因为看到了此消息就自动在前一行加上分号。

trans-unit.source: (S syntax) This is an educated guess made in conjunction with the message "%s found where operator expected". It often means a subroutine or module name is being referenced that hasn't been declared yet. This may be because of ordering problems in your file, or because of a missing "sub", "package", "require", or "use" statement. If you're referencing something that isn't defined yet, you don't actually have to define the subroutine or package before the current location. You can use an empty "sub foo;" or "package FOO;" to enter a "forward" declaration.
trans-unit.target: （S语法）这是与消息“在操作员期望的位置找到％s”一起进行的有根据的猜测。这通常意味着正在引用尚未声明的子例程或模块名称。这可能是由于文件中的排序问题，或者是因为缺少“ sub”，“ package”，“ require”或“ use”语句。如果引用的是尚未定义的内容，则实际上不必在当前位置之前定义子例程或程序包。您可以使用一个空的“ sub foo;”。或“包裹FOO；” 输入“转发”声明。

trans-unit.source: (S syntax) This is an educated guess made in conjunction with the message "%s found where operator expected". Often the missing operator is a comma.
trans-unit.target: （S语法）这是与消息“在操作员期望的位置找到％s”一起进行的有根据的猜测。通常缺少的运算符是逗号。

trans-unit.source: (S utf8) Perl met a wide character (>255) when it wasn't expecting one. This warning is by default on for I/O (like print). The easiest way to quiet this warning is simply to add the :utf8 layer to the output, e.g. binmode STDOUT, ':utf8' . Another way to turn off the warning is to add no warnings 'utf8'; but that is often closer to cheating. In general, you are supposed to explicitly mark the filehandle with an encoding, see open and binmode.
trans-unit.target: （Sutf8）Perl没想到会遇到一个宽字符（> 255）。对于I / O（如打印），默认情况下此警告处于打开状态。消除此警告的最简单方法是在输出中添加 :utf8 层，例如 binmode STDOUT, ':utf8' 。关闭该警告的另一种方法是添加 no warnings 'utf8'; 但这通常更接近作弊。通常，应该使用编码明确标记文件句柄，请参见open和binmode。

trans-unit.source: (S utf8) Perl met a wide character (ordinal >255) when it wasn't expecting one. This warning is by default on for I/O (like print).
trans-unit.target: （Sutf8）Perl没想到会遇到一个宽泛的角色（常规> 255）。默认情况下，此警告对于I / O（如打印）处于启用状态。

trans-unit.source: (S utf8) When reading in different encodings, Perl tries to map everything into Unicode characters. The bytes you read in are not legal in this encoding. For example
trans-unit.target: （Sutf8）当以不同的编码读取时，Perl尝试将所有内容映射为Unicode字符。您读取的字节在此编码中是非法的。例如

trans-unit.source: (S utf8)(F) Perl detected a string that didn't comply with UTF-8 encoding rules, even though it had the UTF8 flag on.
trans-unit.target: （S utf8）（F）Perl检测到一个不符合UTF-8编码规则的字符串，即使它已启用UTF8标志。

trans-unit.source: (S utf8)(F) Perl detected a string that should be UTF-8, but didn't comply with UTF-8 encoding rules, or represents a code point whose ordinal integer value doesn't fit into the word size of the current platform (overflows). Details as to the exact malformation are given in the variable, %s, part of the message.
trans-unit.target: （S utf8）（F）Perl检测到一个字符串应为UTF-8，但不符合UTF-8编码规则，或表示一个代码点，其序数整数值不适合当前字符串的字长平台（溢出）。消息的一部分变量 %s 中提供了有关确切格式错误的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: (S) A module passed the flag 0x01 to DynaLoader::dl_load_file() to request that symbols from the stated file are made available globally within the process, but that functionality is not available on this platform. Whilst the module likely will still work, this may prevent the perl interpreter from loading other XS-based extensions which need to link directly to functions defined in the C or XS code in the stated file.
trans-unit.target: （S）一个模块将标志0x01传递给DynaLoader :: dl_load_file（），以请求使所声明文件中的符号在该过程中全局可用，但该功能在该平台上不可用。尽管该模块可能仍然可以工作，但是这可能会阻止perl解释器加载其他基于XS的扩展，这些扩展需要直接链接至所述文件中C或XS代码中定义的功能。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning from the GDBM_File extension that a store failed.
trans-unit.target: （S）来自GDBM_File扩展名的警告，指示存储失败。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. Perl keeps track of the number of times you've called fork and exec, to determine whether the current call to exec should affect the current script or a subprocess (see exec LIST in perlvms). Somehow, this count has become scrambled, so Perl is making a guess and treating this exec as a request to terminate the Perl script and execute the specified command.
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。Perl会跟踪您调用 fork 和 exec 的次数，以确定当前对 exec 的调用是否应该影响当前脚本或子进程（请参阅perlvms中的exec LIST）。不知何故，此计数变得混乱了，因此Perl进行猜测，并将此 exec 视为终止Perl脚本并执行指定命令的请求。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. Perl keeps track of the number of times you've called fork and exec, to determine whether the current call to exec should affect the current script or a subprocess (see "exec LIST" in perlvms). Somehow, this count has become scrambled, so Perl is making a guess and treating this exec as a request to terminate the Perl script and execute the specified command.
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。Perl会跟踪您调用 fork 和 exec 的次数，以确定当前对 exec 的调用是否应该影响当前脚本或子进程（请参阅perlvms中的“ exec LIST”）。不知何故，此计数变得混乱了，因此Perl进行猜测，并将此 exec 视为终止Perl脚本并执行指定命令的请求。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. Perl tried to read an element of %ENV from the CRTL's internal environment array and discovered the array was missing. You need to figure out where your CRTL misplaced its environ or define
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。Perl尝试从CRTL的内部环境数组中读取％ENV元素，并发现该数组丢失。您需要弄清楚CRTL在哪里错放了它的环境或定义了

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. Perl was unable to find the local timezone offset, so it's assuming that local system time is equivalent to UTC. If it's not, define the logical name
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。Perl无法找到本地时区偏移量，因此假设本地系统时间等于UTC。如果不是，请定义逻辑名

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. The call to sys$getuai underlying the getpwnam operator returned an invalid UIC.
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。要将呼叫 sys$getuai 底层 getpwnam 操作返回无效UIC。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. The call to sys$getuai underlying the getpwnam operator returned an invalid UIC.
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。要将呼叫 sys$getuai 底层 getpwnam 操作返回无效UIC。

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. This arises because of the difference between access checks under VMS and under the Unix model Perl assumes. Under VMS, access checks are done by filename, rather than by bits in the stat buffer, so that ACLs and other protections can be taken into account. Unfortunately, Perl assumes that the stat buffer contains all the necessary information, and passes it, instead of the filespec, to the access-checking routine. It will try to retrieve the filespec using the device name and FID present in the stat buffer, but this works only if you haven't made a subsequent call to the CRTL stat() routine, because the device name is overwritten with each call. If this warning appears, the name lookup failed, and the access-checking routine gave up and returned FALSE, just to be conservative. (Note: The access-checking routine knows about the Perl stat operator and file tests, so you shouldn't ever see this warning in response to a Perl command; it arises only if some internal code takes stat buffers lightly.)
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。这是由于VMS和Perl假定的Unix模型下的访问检查之间存在差异而引起的。在VMS下，访问检查是通过文件名而不是通过统计缓冲区中的位来完成的，因此可以考虑ACL和其他保护。不幸的是，Perl假定stat缓冲区包含所有必要的信息，并将其而不是filespec传递给访问检查例程。它将尝试使用stat缓冲区中存在的设备名称和FID检索filespec，但这仅在您未对CRTL stat（）例程进行后续调用的情况下有效，因为每次调用都会覆盖设备名称。如果出现此警告，则名称查找失败，并且为了保守起见，访问检查例程放弃并返回FALSE。 （注意：访问检查例程了解Perl stat 运算符和文件测试，因此您永远不会在响应Perl命令时看到此警告；仅当某些内部代码稍微占用stat缓冲区时，它才会出现。）

trans-unit.source: (S) A warning peculiar to VMS. This arises because of the difference between access checks under VMS and under the Unix model Perl assumes. Under VMS, access checks are done by filename, rather than by bits in the stat buffer, so that ACLs and other protections can be taken into account. Unfortunately, Perl assumes that the stat buffer contains all the necessary information, and passes it, instead of the filespec, to the access-checking routine. It will try to retrieve the filespec using the device name and FID present in the stat buffer, but this works only if you haven't made a subsequent call to the CRTL stat() routine, because the device name is overwritten with each call. If this warning appears, the name lookup failed, and the access-checking routine gave up and returned FALSE, just to be conservative. (Note: The access-checking routine knows about the Perl stat operator and file tests, so you shouldn't ever see this warning in response to a Perl command; it arises only if some internal code takes stat buffers lightly.)
trans-unit.target: （S）VMS特有的警告。这是由于VMS和Perl假定的Unix模型下的访问检查之间存在差异而引起的。在VMS下，访问检查是通过文件名而不是通过统计缓冲区中的位来完成的，因此可以考虑ACL和其他保护。不幸的是，Perl假定stat缓冲区包含所有必要的信息，并将其而不是filespec传递给访问检查例程。它将尝试使用stat缓冲区中存在的设备名称和FID检索filespec，但这仅在您未随后调用CRTL stat（）例程的情况下才有效，因为每次调用都会覆盖设备名称。如果出现此警告，则名称查找失败，并且为了保守起见，访问检查例程放弃并返回FALSE。 （笔记：访问检查例程了解Perl stat 运算符和文件测试，因此您永远都不会在响应Perl命令时看到此警告；仅当某些内部代码稍微占用stat缓冲区时，它才会出现。）

trans-unit.source: (S) An advisory indicating that the previous error may have been caused by a missing delimiter on a string or pattern, because it eventually ended earlier on the current line.
trans-unit.target: （S）一条警告，指示先前的错误可能是由字符串或模式上缺少定界符引起的，因为该错误最终在当前行上更早结束。

trans-unit.source: (S) An uncaught die() was called when PERL_EXIT_WARN was set in PL_exit_flags .
trans-unit.target: （S）在 PERL_EXIT_WARN 中设置 PL_exit_flags 时，调用了一个未捕获的die（）。

trans-unit.source: (S) An uncaught die() was called when PERL_EXIT_WARN was set in PL_exit_flags.
trans-unit.target: （S）在 PERL_EXIT_WARN 中设置 PL_exit_flags 时，调用了一个未捕获的die（）。

trans-unit.source: (S) If you see this message, then something is seriously wrong with the internal bookkeeping of op trees. An op tree needed to be freed after a compilation error, but could not be found, so it was leaked instead.
trans-unit.target: （S）如果您看到此消息，则说明运营树的内部簿记存在严重错误。编译错误后需要释放op树，但找不到它，因此它被泄漏了。

trans-unit.source: (S) PERL_HASH_SEED should match /^\s*(?:0x)?[0-9a-fA-F]+\s*\z/ but it contained a non hex character. This could mean you are not using the hash seed you think you are.
trans-unit.target: （S）PERL_HASH_SEED应该匹配/ ^ \ s *（?: 0x）？[0-9a-fA-F] + \ s * \ z /，但其中包含非十六进制字符。这可能意味着您没有使用您认为的哈希种子。

trans-unit.source: (S) Perl was run with the environment variable PERL_PERTURB_KEYS defined but containing an unexpected value. The legal values of this setting are as follows.
trans-unit.target: （S）Perl在定义了环境变量PERL_PERTURB_KEYS的情况下运行，但其中包含意外值。此设置的合法值如下。

trans-unit.source: (S) The implicit close() done by an open() got an error indication on the close(). This usually indicates your file system ran out of disk space.
trans-unit.target: （S）由open（）完成的隐式close（）在close（）上显示错误指示。这通常表示文件系统磁盘空间不足。

trans-unit.source: (S) The whole warning message will look something like:
trans-unit.target: （S）整个警告消息如下所示：

trans-unit.source: (S) This warning indicates something wrong in the internals of perl. Perl was trying to find the class (e.g. LISTOP) of a particular OP, and was unable to do so. This is likely to be due to a bug in the perl internals, or due to a bug in XS code which manipulates perl optrees.
trans-unit.target: （S）此警告表明perl内部错误。Perl试图找到特定OP的类（例如LISTOP），但无法做到这一点。这可能是由于perl内部错误，或者是由于操纵perl optree的XS代码存在错误。

trans-unit.source: (See "Background and PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT" in perlguts for the explanation of the aTHX_. ) Hiding the short forms is very useful for avoiding all sorts of nasty (C preprocessor or otherwise) conflicts with other software packages (Perl defines about 2400 APIs with these short names, take or leave few hundred, so there certainly is room for conflict.)
trans-unit.target: （见在perlguts“背景和PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT”为的解释 aTHX_ ）隐藏短形式是非常有用的，以避免各种讨厌的（C预处理器或其他方式）与其他软件包的Perl定义了关于2400级的API与这些短冲突（名称，留下几百个，所以肯定有冲突的余地。）

trans-unit.source: (See Background and PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT in perlguts for the explanation of the aTHX_ . ) Hiding the short forms is very useful for avoiding all sorts of nasty (C preprocessor or otherwise) conflicts with other software packages (Perl defines about 2400 APIs with these short names, take or leave few hundred, so there certainly is room for conflict.)
trans-unit.target: （见背景和PERL_IMPLICIT_CONTEXT在perlguts为的解释 aTHX_ ）隐藏缩写形式是为了避免各种讨厌的非常有用的（C预处理器或其他方式）与其他软件包的Perl定义了关于2400级的API与这些短名称冲突（，拿走或离开几百，所以肯定有冲突的余地。）

trans-unit.source: (See perllocale for information about these.) When a Perl interpreter normally starts up, it tells the system it wants to use the system's default locale. This is often, but not necessarily, the "C" or "POSIX" locale. Absent a "use locale" within the perl code, this mostly has no effect (but see "Not within the scope of "use locale"" in perllocale). Also, there is not a problem if the locale you want to use in your embedded perl is the same as the system default. However, this doesn't work if you have set up and want to use a locale that isn't the system default one. Starting in Perl v5.20, you can tell the embedded Perl interpreter that the locale is already properly set up, and to skip doing its own normal initialization. It skips if the environment variable PERL_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT is set (even if set to 0 or ""). A perl that has this capability will define the C pre-processor symbol HAS_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT. This allows code that has to work with multiple Perl versions to do some sort of work-around when confronted with an earlier Perl.
trans-unit.target: （有关这些信息，请参见perllocale。）当Perl解释器正常启动时，它会告诉系统它要使用系统的默认语言环境。这通常是（但不一定是）“ C”或“ POSIX”语言环境。在perl代码中缺少 "use locale" ，这几乎没有效果（但请参阅perllocale中的“不在“使用区域设置”范围内”））。同样，如果要在嵌入式perl中使用的语言环境与系统默认语言相同，也没有问题。但是，如果您已经设置并想使用不是系统默认语言环境的语言环境，则此方法将无效。从Perl v5.20开始，您可以告诉嵌入式Perl解释器该语言环境已经正确设置，并且可以跳过进行其自身的常规初始化。如果设置了环境变量 PERL_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT （即使设置为0或 "" ），它也会跳过。具有此功能的perl将定义C预处理程序符号 HAS_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT 。当遇到较早的Perl时，这允许必须与多个Perl版本一起使用的代码可以进行某种变通。

trans-unit.source: (See perllocale for information about these.) When a Perl interpreter normally starts up, it tells the system it wants to use the system's default locale. This is often, but not necessarily, the "C" or "POSIX" locale. Absent a "use locale" within the perl code, this mostly has no effect (but see Not within the scope of use locale in perllocale). Also, there is not a problem if the locale you want to use in your embedded Perl is the same as the system default. However, this doesn't work if you have set up and want to use a locale that isn't the system default one. Starting in Perl v5.20, you can tell the embedded Perl interpreter that the locale is already properly set up, and to skip doing its own normal initialization. It skips if the environment variable PERL_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT is set (even if set to 0 or "" ). A Perl that has this capability will define the C pre-processor symbol HAS_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT . This allows code that has to work with multiple Perl versions to do some sort of work-around when confronted with an earlier Perl.
trans-unit.target: （有关这些信息，请参阅perllocale。）当Perl解释器正常启动时，它会告诉系统它要使用系统的默认语言环境。这通常是（但不一定是）“ C”或“ POSIX”语言环境。在perl代码中缺少 "use locale" ，这几乎没有任何效果（但请参阅不在perllocale的使用区域设置范围内）。同样，如果要在嵌入式Perl中使用的语言环境与系统默认语言相同，也没有问题。但是，如果您已经设置并想使用不是系统默认语言环境的语言环境，则此方法将无效。从Perl v5.20开始，您可以告诉嵌入式Perl解释器该语言环境已经正确设置，并且可以跳过进行其自身的常规初始化。如果环境变量，则跳过 PERL_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT 设置了PERL_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT（即使设置为0或 "" ）。具有此功能的Perl将定义C预处理程序符号 HAS_SKIP_LOCALE_INIT 。当遇到较早的Perl时，这允许必须与多个Perl版本一起使用的代码可以进行某种变通。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl 5.18.0) Set to "0" or "NO" then traversing keys will be repeatable from run to run for the same PERL_HASH_SEED. Insertion into a hash will not change the order, except to provide for more space in the hash. When combined with setting PERL_HASH_SEED this mode is as close to pre 5.18 behavior as you can get.
trans-unit.target: （从Perl 5.18.0开始）设置为 "0" 或 "NO" 则对于相同的 PERL_HASH_SEED 来说,遍历遍历遍历键是可重复的。插入到哈希表中不会改变顺序，除非在哈希表中提供更多空间。与设置PERL_HASH_SEED结合使用时，此模式将尽可能接近5.18之前的行为。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl 5.18.0) Set to "0" or "NO" then traversing keys will be repeatable from run to run for the same PERL_HASH_SEED. Insertion into a hash will not change the order, except to provide for more space in the hash. When combined with setting PERL_HASH_SEED this mode is as close to pre 5.18 behavior as you can get.
trans-unit.target: （从Perl 5.18.0开始）设置为 "0" 或 "NO" 则对于相同的PERL_HASH_SEED，遍历遍历遍历键将是可重复的。插入到哈希中不会改变顺序，除非在哈希中提供更多空间。与设置PERL_HASH_SEED结合使用时，此模式将尽可能接近5.18之前的行为。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl 5.8.1, new semantics in Perl 5.18.0) Used to override the randomization of Perl's internal hash function. The value is expressed in hexadecimal, and may include a leading 0x. Truncated patterns are treated as though they are suffixed with sufficient 0's as required.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl 5.8.1开始，Perl 5.18.0中的新语义）用于覆盖Perl内部哈希函数的随机化。该值以十六进制表示，并且可以包括前导0x。截断的模式将被视作根据需要以足够的0加上后缀。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl 5.8.1.) Set to "1" to display (to STDERR) information about the hash function, seed, and what type of key traversal randomization is in effect at the beginning of execution. This, combined with "PERL_HASH_SEED" and "PERL_PERTURB_KEYS" is intended to aid in debugging nondeterministic behaviour caused by hash randomization.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl 5.8.1开始。）设置为 "1" 以显示（到STDERR）有关散列函数，种子以及在执行开始时有效的密钥遍历随机类型的信息。结合“ PERL_HASH_SEED”和“ PERL_PERTURB_KEYS”可帮助调试由哈希随机化引起的不确定行为。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl 5.8.1.) Set to "1" to display (to STDERR) information about the hash function, seed, and what type of key traversal randomization is in effect at the beginning of execution. This, combined with PERL_HASH_SEED and PERL_PERTURB_KEYS is intended to aid in debugging nondeterministic behaviour caused by hash randomization.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl 5.8.1开始。）设置为 "1" 以显示（到STDERR）有关散列函数，种子以及在执行开始时有效的密钥遍历随机类型的信息。结合PERL_HASH_SEED和PERL_PERTURB_KEYS可以帮助调试由哈希随机化引起的不确定行为。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) Attempts to convert in-place the octet sequence encoded in Perl's extended UTF-8 to the corresponding character sequence. That is, it replaces each sequence of characters in the string whose ords represent a valid (extended) UTF-8 byte sequence, with the corresponding single character. The UTF-8 flag is turned on only if the source string contains multiple-byte UTF-8 characters. If
trans-unit.target: （从Perl v5.8.0开始）尝试将Perl的扩展UTF-8编码的八位位组序列就地转换为相应的字符序列。也就是说，它用相应的单个字符替换其ord表示有效（扩展）UTF-8字节序列的字符串中的每个字符序列。仅当源字符串包含多字节UTF-8字符时，才会打开UTF-8标志。如果

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) Converts in-place the character sequence to the corresponding octet sequence in Perl's extended UTF-8. That is, every (possibly wide) character gets replaced with a sequence of one or more characters that represent the individual UTF-8 bytes of the character. The UTF8 flag is turned off. Returns nothing.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl v5.8.0开始）在Perl的扩展UTF-8中将字符序列转换为相应的八位位组序列。也就是说，每个（可能是较宽的）字符都被一个或多个代表字符的各个UTF-8字节的字符替换。UTF8标志已关闭。不返回任何内容。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) Converts in-place the internal representation of the string from UTF-8 to the equivalent octet sequence in the native encoding (Latin-1 or EBCDIC). The logical character sequence itself is unchanged. If
trans-unit.target: （自Perl v5.8.0起）将字符串的内部表示形式从UTF-8就地转换为本地编码（Latin-1或EBCDIC）中的等效八位位组序列。逻辑字符序列本身未更改。如果

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) Converts in-place the internal representation of the string from an octet sequence in the native encoding (Latin-1 or EBCDIC) to UTF-8. The logical character sequence itself is unchanged. If
trans-unit.target: （自Perl v5.8.0起）将字符串的内部表示形式从本地编码（Latin-1或EBCDIC）的八位位组序列转换为UTF-8。逻辑字符序列本身未更改。如果

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) This is the inverse of utf8::native_to_unicode() , converting the other direction. Again, on ASCII platforms, this returns its input, but on EBCDIC platforms it will find the native platform code point, given any Unicode one.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl v5.8.0起）这是 utf8::native_to_unicode() 的反函数，它转换了另一个方向。同样，在ASCII平台上，这将返回其输入，但在EBCDIC平台上，给定任何Unicode，它将找到本机平台代码点。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) This is the inverse of utf8::native_to_unicode(), converting the other direction. Again, on ASCII platforms, this returns its input, but on EBCDIC platforms it will find the native platform code point, given any Unicode one.
trans-unit.target: （自Perl v5.8.0起）这是 utf8::native_to_unicode() 的反函数，它转换了另一个方向。同样，在ASCII平台上，这将返回其输入，但是在EBCDIC平台上，给定任何Unicode，它将找到本机平台代码点。

trans-unit.source: (Since Perl v5.8.0) This takes an unsigned integer (which represents the ordinal number of a character (or a code point) on the platform the program is being run on) and returns its Unicode equivalent value. Since ASCII platforms natively use the Unicode code points, this function returns its input on them. On EBCDIC platforms it converts from EBCDIC to Unicode.
trans-unit.target: （从Perl v5.8.0开始）这将获取一个无符号整数（表示程序在其上运行的平台上的字符（或代码点）的序数），并返回其Unicode等效值。由于ASCII平台本机使用Unicode代码点，因此此函数在其上返回其输入。在EBCDIC平台上，它将从EBCDIC转换为Unicode。

trans-unit.source: (Solaris) exit resets file pointers, which is a problem when called from a child process (created by fork) in BEGIN. A workaround is to use POSIX::_exit.
trans-unit.target: （Solaris） exit 重置文件指针，当从 BEGIN 中的子进程（由 fork 创建）调用时，这是一个问题。一种解决方法是使用 POSIX::_exit 。

trans-unit.source: (The -T is here to prevent '.' from being listed in @INC.) They should all have their own documentation installed and accessible via your system man(1) command. If you do not have a find program, you can use the Perl find2perl program instead, which generates Perl code as output you can run through perl. If you have a man program but it doesn't find your modules, you'll have to fix your manpath. See perl for details. If you have no system man command, you might try the perldoc program.
trans-unit.target: （这里的-T是为了防止'。'在@INC中列出。）它们都应该安装自己的文档，并可以通过您的system man（1）命令进行访问。如果没有find程序，则可以改用Perl find2perl程序，该程序会生成Perl代码作为输出，您可以通过perl运行它。如果您有一个man程序，但是找不到您的模块，则必须修复您的manpath。有关详细信息，请参见perl。如果没有system man命令，则可以尝试perldoc程序。

trans-unit.source: (The PlatformSDKDir might need to be set differently depending on which version you are using. trans-unit.source: (The above example shows the most important case of this: when the target is a Perl older than 5.12 (where the core library directories take precedence over the site library directories) and the module being installed was included in core in that Perl version. Under those circumstances, an upgrade of the module from CPAN is only possible by installing to the core library.)
trans-unit.target: （上面的示例显示了最重要的情况：当目标是早于5.12的Perl（其中核心库目录优先于站点库目录）并且要安装的模块包含在该Perl版本的核心中。在这种情况下，只有通过安装到核心库才能从CPAN升级模块。）
